Uncertainty is unacceptable.” In addition, if you are attuned to the armor for 24 consecutive hours, your commitment to duty extends to the person you trust most. You or your GM determine who this person is. You consider this person your field commander and put their plans ahead of your own and trust them implicitly. You can't attune to the Red Queen's burden or the Violet King's promise. If you're already attuned to either of them, your attunement to it immediately ends once this effect is extended to you. The first creature you meet who is attuned to either of these weapons becomes your field commander, regardless of who you previously considered it to be. You become charmed by them and obey their commands to the best of your ability. If you find the Red Queen's burden or Violet King's promise without an owner, you are compelled to protect it with your life until a rightful owner is found. These effects can be removed with a @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Greater Restoration]{greater restoration} spell, but not while you are attuned to the armor.

Flavour: The yellow of the royal scouts' armor was well known throughout their lands. While rarely seen, everyone still knew that a flash of yellow within the woods was a warning: not a mistake. Entire war camps would disband overnight to avoid becoming the scouts' prey. They, too, had heard of the yellow-fletched arrows that would sprout like gruesome flowers from the bodies of the hunted. "Yellow-bellied" wasn't a term used to describe a lack of bravery within the queen's and king's realm: it was used to describe those who'd fallen to their scouts.

save.chatFlavor: "From Sky to Earth!"

Yellow Harbinger's Path - Advantage on I.name: Yellow Harbinger's Path - Advantage on Initiative

Wind-Up Merchant.name: Wind-Up Merchant
Wind-Up Merchant.description:
This soft toy figurine is 5 inches tall and weighs 1 pound. You can use an action to wind up the toy using a crank in the back, causing it to release a thin strip of parchment listing 3 magic items and their costs from the list below. The toy then whirs and animates slowly, walking and bowing slightly, and can't be wound up again until 24 hours have passed.

 

Roll [[/r 3d12 #Wind-Up Merchant]], recording each number rolled, to determine which of the following magic items are listed on the parchment. At the GM's discretion, reroll duplicate results.

 

[[/r 1d12 #Wind-Up Merchant]] Item Name Cost
1 @Compendium[dnd5e.items.Potion of Climbing] 25gp
2 @Compendium[dnd5e.items.Potion of Healing] 25gp
3 spell scroll, 1st level: @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Comprehend Languages]{comprehend languages} (25%), @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Detect Magic]{detect magic} (25%), @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Feather Fall]{feather fall} (25%), or @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Identify]{identify} (25%) 25gp
4 @Compendium[dnd5e.items.Broom of Flying] 50gp
5 @Compendium[dnd5e.items.Dust of Disappearance] 50gp
6 @Compendium[dnd5e.items.Eversmoking Bottle] 50gp
7 @Compendium[dnd5e.items.Goggles of Night] 50gp
8 @Compendium[dnd5e.items.Immovable Rod] 50gp
9 @Compendium[dnd5e.items.Potion of Growth] 50gp
10 potion of resistance 50gp
11 @Compendium[dnd5e.items.Restorative Ointment] 50gp
12 @Compendium[dnd5e.items.Ring of Water Walking] 50gp

 

While the toy is animated, you can use an action to deposit any number of coins into the slot on the toy's belly and speak the name of an item listed on the parchment. If the value of the coins deposited in the toy is equal to or greater than the cost of the named item, the item magically appears in your hand or at your feet (your choice) and is removed from the parchment. The spent coins are then lost.

 

The toy remains animated for 5 minutes or until each item has been purchased from the list. When the toy stops animating, any deposited coins that weren't spent on the listed items clatter to the ground below it, converting them into smaller denominations as needed, and the parchment turns to dust and is destroyed.

 

An item purchased from the wind-up merchant disappears after 24 hours, or early if you attempt to sell or trade it to another creature.

Flavour: "What'cha got for rent today, little guy?"

Godsteel Worldcarver (Greatsword).name: Godsteel Worldcarver (Greatsword)
Godsteel Worldcarver (Greatsword).description:
This hefty blade becomes miraculously nimble in hand, as if a portion of its weight were displaced elsewhere. If the weapon is a greatsword, Small creatures don't make attack rolls with disadvantage using this weapon as a result of its heavy property. You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon, which deals an extra 1d8 radiant damage to any target it hits.

While holding the weapon, you can use a bonus action to magically store it in a special extradimensional space. While the weapon is stored in this space, you can use a bonus action to magically retrieve it again, causing the weapon to reappear in your hand. If the sword is ever more than 30 feet away from you, it magically vanishes into the space on its own.

When you roll a 20 on an attack roll made with this weapon, you can force the target to make a DC 17 Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes an extra 3d8 radiant damage, and if the target is a creature, it is incapacitated and banished to a special demiplane until the start of your next turn, at which point the target reappears in the space it left or in the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied. On a successful save, the target takes half as much radiant damage and isn't incapacitated or transported. If you are a cleric or paladin, you and each creature of your choice within 30 feet of you regains a number of hit points equal to half the radiant damage dealt in this way.

Flavour: The blade forged by deities when the world was made. With it, even a mortal could peek behind the curtain of the multiverse. What was this plane of existence? Was it real, or was it simply a room of a larger cosmic dollhouse?

Status Signets.name: Status Signets
Status Signets.description:
These silver rings often come in pairs and indicate the well-being of its wearer. If you and another friendly creature you can see are wearing these rings within 100 feet of each other, you are magically aware of the other creature's current number of hit points and condition.

Flavour: "Hey, you okay? You took that hit pretty hard."

"You know damn well I'm not okay. Now help me up and pass me that potion, will ya?"

Tea Weird.name: Tea Weird
Tea Weird.description:
This Tiny, sentient fragment of a charmed water elemental has an endless desire to create tea. When given a leaf or other potential tea ingredient, its watery form gurgles happily as it begins to steep it, magically heating the water surrounding the ingredient to its ideal brewing temperature. It only picks up materials it chooses to and can control whether or not it's wet to the touch. The tea weird can inhabit up to 1 gallon of water, or as little as 1 ounce. Any water controlled by the tea weird is magical for the duration.

The tea weird is considered a magical object and is not a creature. It has a speed of 5 feet and can hover up to 5 feet off the ground. It has AC 10, 10 hit points, and has resistance to all damage. The tea weird regains all its hit points if given at least 1 ounce of water. Drinking the entire tea weird is harmless to you, but destroys the item.

Sentience. The tea weird is a sentient chaotic good item with an Intelligence of 3, a Wisdom of 8, and a Charisma of 6. It has hearing and darkvision out to a range of 60 feet. It can't speak or read, but understands Aquan and Common.

Personality. The tea weird is dedicated to making tea. It will happily collect moisture, steep it with fresh ingredients, and then separate itself from the freshly brewed tea by pouring it into a cup or similar vessel. It avoids combat at all costs and enjoys resting in cups, kettles, or the pockets of friendly creatures.

Flavour: "Hey, what flavor is this?"

"You mean the tea? I think the tea weird found a mint leaf about a mile back."

"No no, not that. I meant the flavor text."

"Oh, that's meta flavor. It gets old quick, but it's nice to try it out again every once in a while."

Dusk Dagger (Rare).name: Dusk Dagger (Rare)
Dusk Dagger (Rare).description:
This delicately curved dagger is ornamented with several crescent moon designs. When you hit a creature who is completely in dim light or darkness with this magic weapon, that creature takes an extra 1d8 (rare) psychic damage.

Flavour: "There is nothing in the dark that can hurt you."

—Thieves' Cant for nighttime ambush

Contingency Band.name: Contingency Band
Contingency Band.description:
Each of this leather ring's three braided bands bears the design of a dark, winding serpent. You can use an action to submerge the ring in a potion of healing or similar healing draft. If the ring is left to sit in a potion for 1 minute in this way, the ring magically consumes it and any of its healing properties. For each potion the ring has consumed, one of its dark serpents glows with a faint red light. The ring can have up to 3 consumed potions at a time.

Immediately after you take damage while wearing the ring, you can use your reaction to speak its command word and gain the healing effects of one of the ring's consumed potions (your choice). The consumed potion is then lost, and one of the ring's serpents becomes dark once more.

Flavour: "Why on earth would you put that thing on?"

"What, the ring? I thought it was cute. Lookit the little snakes."

"We haven't even figured out what it does yet. That could be cursed. You could be cursed right now. Maybe you'll suffer a snake bite each time you sit down now, or something. Or be poisoned each time you stub your toe."

"Unlikely. Snakes aren't poisonous, they're venomous, so it wouldn't make sense for me to be poisoned."

"Oh, sure, of course. My mistake. You'll probably magically heal or something instead when you stub your toe. Way more likely."

Rod of Thought Projection.name: Rod of Thought Projection
Rod of Thought Projection.description:
While holding this rod, you can use an action to create a mental connection with a willing humanoid creature that you can see within 120 feet of you. The connection lasts as long as you concentrate (as if concentrating on a spell), or until the other creature chooses to close it or moves farther than 120 feet away from you. For the duration, you can communicate with it telepathically. In addition, as part of the action to open this connection or as an action on a subsequent turn while it remains open, you can choose to see through the creature's eyes and hear what it hears until the start of your next turn, gaining the benefits of any special senses that the creature has. During this time, you are deaf and blind with regard to your own senses.

If the creature is unwilling, it must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or have the mental connection be established anyway. The creature is aware of the effect when it makes the saving throw. At the end of each of the creature's turns, it can make another Wisdom saving throw. On a success, the connection is severed, and the effect ends. Once the rod has been used on an unwilling creature in this way, it can't do so again until the next dawn.

Flavour: Our two minds mustn't be made to feel so isolated. They may be within different vessels, but just like our physical selves, our minds, too, can touch and work in tandem.

Underworld Asphodel Regalia.name: Underworld Asphodel Regalia
Underworld Asphodel Regalia.description:
This set of royal finery was worn by a noble necromancer with a unique appreciation for the quality of life that extends beyond death. Asphodel blossoms, representing life beyond the tomb, ornament this enchanted outfit. The lush flowers in its laurel crown are nestled among long-dead leaves.

 

While wearing the regalia, you can cast the @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Animate Dead]{animate dead} spell from it over the course of 1 minute. You can use this property a number of times equal to your spellcasting ability modifier, and you regain all expended uses daily at dusk. When you create an undead using a necromancy spell, the creature's hit point maximum is increased by an amount equal to five times your spellcasting ability modifier. In addition, when you cast a spell that deals necrotic damage, you can add your spellcasting ability modifier to one damage roll of that spell.

 

Chthonic Command. As an action, you can issue a command of either dismissal or obedience to an undead creature within 60 feet of you. That creature must make a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC. A creature immune to features that turn undead automatically succeeds on the saving throw. On a failed save, you can impose one of the following effects on that creature for 1 minute:

  • The creature must spend its turns trying to move as far away from you as it can, and it can't willingly move into a space within 30 feet of you. It also can't take reactions. For its action, it can use only the Dash action or try to escape from an effect that prevents it from moving. If it has nowhere it can move, the creature can use the Dodge action. This effect ends early if that creature takes any damage.
  • The creature is charmed by you. While the creature is charmed, you have a telepathic link with it as long as the two of you are on the same plane of existence. You can use this telepathic link to issue commands to the creature while you are conscious (no action required), which it does its best to obey. You can specify a simple and general course of action, such as "Attack that creature," "Run over there," or "Fetch that object." If the creature completes the order and doesn't receive further direction from you, it defends and preserves itself to the best of its ability. Each time the creature takes damage, it makes a new Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC. If the saving throw succeeds, the effect ends.

 

You can use this property a number of times equal to your spellcasting ability modifier. You regain all expended uses daily at dusk.

 

Ruler of the Dead. You are always under the effects of the @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Sanctuary]{sanctuary} spell. This version of the spell only affects undead. If you make an attack or cast a spell that affects an undead creature, that creature is immune to this spell's effects for 24 hours.

Flavour: For years, we complied to the shackle of mortality that had been placed on us by the greater powers. Looking down upon us with enough disdain to allow us to die whilst jealously guarding immortality for themselves. Why was it fair for them to withhold eternity from us, just because we were born human? It was no wonder that at the first moment we could, we forsook them for the only being who could shatter our shackles: the Deathless.

 

The Deathless was the power that ruled the Underworld. We begged the Deathless to let us live. We begged for freedom from the emptiness of death. We wailed the lamentations of our souls and laid our breasts bare for the Deathless. We slashed our arms and spilled our blood. For years did we pine for the Deathless' attention, suffering every innumerable pain endurable by our fragile mortal shells. Yet even with all this, the Deathless remained silent.

 

With naught but a heart determined to see our people weep no more, one from amongst our number declared that if the Deathless would turn a deaf ear to us, then he would force the Deathless to hear our demands. He would walk alone, and stride the path to the very Underworld itself. There, he, burdened with the yolk of our sorrows, would find a cure for death.

 

We assured him that his intent was steeped with madness, but his will was iron, and before the first light of the next dawn, he departed us. We never expected his return.

 

It was not until a year and a day had passed did we see him again. He looked unwell; sickly pale and devoid of all but the bleakest of emotions. Yet, he strode home atop a glinting chariot of silver pulled by a black stallion, head held high and clothed in macabre finery. What's more...he had not returned alone. His chariot was trailed closely by a retinue of pale figures most familiar to us. Our fathers & mothers. Our grandfathers & grandmothers. Our great grandfathers & great grandmothers. Generations of our long passed family, right up to our thrice-great grandparents, followed behind the one that survived the realm of the Deathless...and they were smiling. He had done what he promised. He had found a cure for death.

 

Such a feeling of euphoria enveloped our beaten hearts, that all at once we fell to our knees as he passed, and pressed our heads to the ground with reverence. For three days after, and for the first time in years, we celebrated. Wine was drunk, feasts were eaten, and songs were sung.

 

When the celebration of the return had ended, it was followed by a coronation of He Who Conquered Death. Though he was born low and though he did refuse at first, we agreed to place the laurel of the people atop his head, for only one who had trod the paths of the Underworld was worthy to be our king.

 

—Excerpt from Chapter VI: The King of the Underworld from Tales of Ages Long Past by Alder Drycholn.

Minute (Shortsword).name: Minute (Shortsword)
Minute (Shortsword).description:
These two magical weapons are bound by a powerful force. Despite there being two weapons, you only need to attune to one of them to use their properties. While holding one of the weapons, you can use an action to determine the distance and direction of the other paired weapon as long as you're on the same plane of existence.

If you attune to one of the weapons while another creature is attuned to the other, you are each aware of the other creature's attunement and must make an Intelligence (Arcana) check contested by the other creature's Intelligence (Arcana) check. The creature that wins the contest remains attuned to the item, and for the next 24 hours, its attunement cannot be broken by another creature attempting to attune to the other weapon. The creature that loses the contest is no longer attuned to the weapon.

While holding both weapons in either hand, you gain several benefits:

- You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with these magic weapons.

- Your perception of time is slightly quickened: allowing you to dodge attacks that would have normally hit you. You gain a +1 bonus to AC.

- When you roll a 20 on an attack roll using Hour (the dagger) against a creature, that creature is subjected to the effect of the @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Slow]{slow} spell until the end of your next turn.

- When you roll a 20 on an attack roll using Minute (the shortsword), you gain the effect of the @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Haste]{haste} spell until the start of your next turn. When the effect ends, you don't suffer the normal effects of the spell ending.

- In addition, you can use an action to lay the two weapons down on the ground. When you do, they magically point north before spinning around to align and tell the current time. When they do, 12:00 is always facing north.

Flavour: Tick, tick, tick. You don't have much time left. What'll be your final moments?

Camilla's Quicksilver Mirror.name: Camilla's Quicksilver Mirror
Camilla's Quicksilver Mirror.description:
This hand mirror is roughly 1 foot tall and weighs 1 pound. While gazing into its reflective surface, you see a version of yourself that's ever-so-slightly different. For example, your legs may bend the opposite direction, your eyes may be pitch black, or your reflection simply takes a moment to match whatever it is you're doing. If you look at your reflection in the mirror while holding it and aren't attuned to the mirror, you are forced to make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, you are frightened of the mirror, are unable to look away from or let go of it, and your speed becomes 0 for the duration. You can repeat this saving throw at the start of each of your turns or whenever you take damage while frightened in this way, ending the effect on a success. If you can't see the mirror, you have advantage on the saving throw. On a successful save, you are immune to this effect for 24 hours.

While attuned to the mirror, you can use an action to hold it out and force another creature within 30 feet of you that can see you to see its own reflection. That creature must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or suffer from one of the following effects (your choice):

Frighten. The creature is frightened of the mirror for up to 1 minute, is unable to look away from it, and its speed becomes 0 for the duration. The creature can repeat this saving throw at the start of each of its turns while frightened in this way, ending the effect on a success. If it can't see the mirror at the start of its turn, it has advantage on the saving throw. On a successful save, the creature is immune to this effect for 24 hours.

Store Reflection. The creature's reflection is stored within the mirror. While stored, you can use an action to look into the mirror and cause your own reflection to become the stored one, simultaneously changing the appearance of your physical form as if you had cast the @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Alter Self]{alter self} spell (Change Appearance option). This version of the spell lasts until it's dispelled. You can have up to 3 stored reflections in this way. A stored reflection is lost after it's used to alter your form. An affected creature is aware that its reflection has been stored, but not its or the mirror's purpose.

These properties can be used a combined total of three times and regain all expended uses daily at dawn. Using a stored reflection to alter your appearance doesn't count against the mirror's total number of uses.

Flavour: "I fear what the mirror will show me, for I cannot trust my own reflection nor the flesh I'm said to wear. Who...or what...have I become?"

Magentan Sun-Saw (Very Rare).name: Magentan Sun-Saw (Very Rare)
Magentan Sun-Saw (Very Rare).description:
The typical magentan sun-saw, an uncommon item, is a falchion with a curved metal guard that protects your hand. The sword has 7 charges and regains [[/r 1d6 + 1 #Magentan Sun-Saw - regain charges]] expended charges daily at dawn.

 

When you hit a target with this magic sword, you can expend 1 of its charges as part of the attack to reach your fingers around the weapon's curved guard and pull it like a trigger. When you do, a line of whirring blades of light springs from the weapon's edge and rips around the length of the sword, rending and tearing into the target to deal an extra 1d6 radiant damage to it. The light is a vibrant magenta.

 

The following magentan sun-saw is a very rare variant with more powerful properties. You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. In addition, when you expend 1 of the weapon's charges when you hit with an attack, the light is sunlight (albeit still magenta in color) and deals an extra 2d6 radiant damage to the target, instead of 1d6. If the target has the Sunlight Sensitivity or Sunlight Hypersensitivity trait, such as a drow or vampire, it's considered to be in sunlight until the end of its next turn.

Flavour: Ultraviolet light kills bacteria. Ultraviolent light kills everything altogether.

Stormbrewer Bracers.name: Stormbrewer Bracers
Stormbrewer Bracers.description:
This pair of electrum bracers are always covered in a thin layer of condensation. When you roll initiative while wearing the bracers, they begin to billow out wafting clouds around your wrists. The clouds surrounding your wrists grow darker with every charge the bracers have, becoming fierce storm clouds when fully charged. The bracers can hold up to 5 charges, which are lost after 1 minute. The bracers gain 1 charge after you hit a hostile creature with a melee weapon attack while wearing them. If the bracers have 5 charges when you hit a creature in this way, they unleash a burst of electricity and lose all their stored charges, dealing 1d8 lightning damage to the target of the attack and up to 2 other creatures of your choice that you can see within 10 feet of you.

In addition, while wearing the bracers, you can use your reaction when you take lightning damage to reduce that damage by 1d8 + 4 and cause the bracers to gain 1 charge.

Flavour: As their anger grew, so too did the storms within.

damage.chatFlavor: When you take lightning damage to reduce that damage by 1d8 + 4 and cause the bracers to gain 1 charge.

utility.chatFlavor: When you take lightning damage to reduce that damage by 1d8 + 4 and cause the bracers to gain 1 charge.

Wildskin Armor.name: Wildskin Armor
Wildskin Armor.description:
This enchanted hide armor magically conforms to your body and moves naturally with your movements.

While wearing this armor, you can choose to have it reinforce your new form when you use your Wild Shape. When you do, your AC while you are transformed is equal to 14 + your Dexterity modifier (maximum 2), unless it's already higher. You gain this benefit even if the armor merges into your new form. Once this property has been used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

Flavour: Feels like I'm wearing nothing at all!

Wildskin Armor - Wild Shape reinforce AC.name: Wildskin Armor - Wild Shape reinforce AC

Shifter's Shine (Uncommon).name: Shifter's Shine (Uncommon)
Shifter's Shine (Uncommon).description:
The typical shifter's shine, a common potion, is a specialty alcoholic beverage that causes your face to appear more glamorous. For 1 hour after drinking this potion, your skin's complexion clears, appears healthier, and grows more taut. Your face, while largely unchanged, is distinctly more attractive and exudes a weak aura of enchantment magic. When you make a Charisma check while under the effects of this potion, you can choose to forgo rolling the d20 to get a 10 on the die. Once you use this property, you can't use it again for the remainder of the potion's duration. The potion is a rich honey color and swirls lazily around, regardless of how it's handled. It can be found in any sort of vessel, though it is usually found in glass jars. The eye of a shapeshifter drifts along the potion's bottom, making it a daunting beverage for the average taverngoer to order. It has an extremely strong alcoholic taste with a hint of caramel. Due to its magical nature, the alcohol within this potion affects a creature twice as much as the alcohol within a nonmagical beverage.

The following shifter's shine is an uncommon variant with additional properties. It also tastes better.

When you drink this potion, you gain the effects of the @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Alter Self]{alter self} spell for 1 hour (no concentration required) or until you end the effect as a bonus action.

Flavour: Everyone seems to get more attractive when you drink. Especially you.

Hushed Ring.name: Hushed Ring
Hushed Ring.description:
This ring creates an arcane field around you that prevents certain modes of communication. While wearing this ring, you cannot be spoken to telepathically by creatures other than the ones you choose.

In addition, while wearing this ring, you can use an action to speak this ring’s command word to create an aura of silence around you. The aura affects creatures other than yourself within 10 feet of you. It remains as long as you concentrate (as if concentrating on a spell), to a maximum of 1 minute. For the duration, when a creature within the aura attempts to speak or utter the verbal components of a spell, it must make a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is unable to speak or produce the verbal components of a spell until the start of its next turn, and any action, bonus action, or reaction it used to do so is wasted. This property of the ring can’t be used again until the next dusk.

Flavour: "Ah, that's better. They were right: silence is golden."

utility.chatFlavor: On a failed save, the creature is unable to speak or produce the verbal components of a spell until the start of its next turn, and any action, bonus action, or reaction it used to do so is wasted. This property of the ring can’t be used again until the next dusk.

save.chatFlavor: On a failed save, the creature is unable to speak or produce the verbal components of a spell until the start of its next turn, and any action, bonus action, or reaction it used to do so is wasted. This property of the ring can’t be used again until the next dusk.

Candleflame Bow (Heavy Crossbow).name: Candleflame Bow (Heavy  Crossbow)
Candleflame Bow (Heavy Crossbow).description:
Wrought from metal in the likeness of a brazier, this ranged weapon's grip has been covered in wax and has a simple candle positioned in front of where the arrow or bolt is fired from. The candle is magic and never runs out of wax, nor can it be removed from the weapon. You can use a bonus action to speak the weapon's command word to cause the candle to light itself, shedding bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet while it's ablaze. While the candle is lit, this magic weapon deals an extra 2 fire damage to any target it hits with a ranged attack. The candle's flame lasts until you use a bonus action to speak the command word again or until you drop or stow the weapon.

If you roll the same number on both d20s when you make a ranged attack roll with advantage or disadvantage using this weapon while its candle is lit, the ammunition becomes wreathed in a conflagration of uncontrollable flames. The arrow or bolt flies toward the target and explodes, destroying the ammunition and dealing 4d6 fire damage to the target on a hit (instead of the attack's normal damage), or half as much damage if the result of the attack roll was less than the target's AC. This fire ignites flammable objects within 5 feet of the target that aren't being worn or carried. This property can't be used again until the next dawn.

Flavour: I will banish the darkness that hangs heavy in our shadows. I will bring clarity and warmth to the disillusioned and cold. Follow my light, and we will walk in the light as one.

Ear Cuff of the Climber.name: Ear Cuff of the Climber
Ear Cuff of the Climber.description:
This brass ear cuff hangs off the side of your ear and dangles several polished spheres of jet from fine chains. While wearing the cuff, whenever you make an ability check to climb, you can treat a d20 roll of 7 or lower as an 8.

Flavour: The law-breaking denizens of the subterranean Platinum Penitentiary are left to spend their miserable lives in squalor. With only time on their hands and weights shackled to their bodies, many who seek to climb up the smooth stone walls to freedom simply fall back down to their mortal release.

A few persistent souls have managed to escape from the prison, however. These crafty escapees are given a unique place in society to give them a second chance at redemption. Where that is or what its purpose is, however, is shrouded in secrecy.

Captain's Pride (Studded Leather).name: Captain's Pride (Studded Leather)
Captain's Pride (Studded Leather).description:
This well-crafted leather armor comes with a sturdy, enveloping longcoat, bearing on its back the insignia of a well-known pirate captain. When you attune to it, the insignia changes to one that represents you instead. While wearing this armor, climbing and swimming don't cost you extra movement, and you can breathe underwater.

 

In addition, you can use a bonus action to shift into a watery, elemental form, gaining the following benefits for the duration:

  • Your speed increases by 10 feet.
  • You have resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks, as well as resistance to acid damage.
  • You have advantage on ability checks to avoid or escape being grappled or restrained. If you’re already grappled or restrained when shift into this form, you automatically escape.
  • While you’re underwater, Wisdom (Perception) checks made to see you have disadvantage.

 

This form lasts as long as you concentrate (as if concentrating on a spell), to a maximum of 1 minute. Once this property of the armor has been used, it can’t be used again until the next dawn.

Flavour: 'Tis a brave life out to sea, my lads,

but I'm sure you'll all agree,

no finer friend, none can contend,

with a captain on the sea!

Aye!

All eyes to our captain lads,

and keep us stem to stern!

All eyes to our captain lads,

ye've got a lot to learn!

 

He's no fear for masts and rigging, lads,

to take to them with grace,

he'll have your back, keep up your slack,

he's master of the place!

Aye!

All eyes to our captain lads,

and keep us stem to stern!

All eyes to our captain lads,

an all the loot we'll earn!

 

For when the sea comes to claim us, lads,

and waves to drag us down,

Its form he'll take, fight for our sake,

and turn the tides around!

Aye!

All eyes to our captain lads,

and keep us stem to stern!

All eyes to our captain lads,

and we'll make our return!

 

—A port town shanty, long-attributed to the crew of Captain Ironbrace, a pirate legendary for his protectiveness of his crew

Focus Circlet.name: Focus Circlet
Focus Circlet.description:
While wearing this silver circlet, you gain a bonus to Constitution saving throws that you make to maintain your concentration on a spell you cast equal to the spell's level, up to a maximum of +3.

Flavour: "Still the chaos in your mind. Focus! While your flesh may be under assault, only you have control of your racing thoughts. Tame them! Harness and steer your concentration toward your goals. Do not be trifled with the aches and bruises of your body, for they are secondary to what lies inside you."

Siege Staff.name: Siege Staff
Siege Staff.description:
This stony staff has been carved into the shape of a castle tower. The staff has 10 charges for the following properties, which use your spell save DC and spell attack bonus, and regains [[/r 1d8 + 2 #Siege Staff - regain charges]] expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll a d20. On a 1, a the staff crumbles into rubble and is destroyed.

 

Battering Strike. This staff can be wielded as a magic quarterstaff. When you hit with a melee attack using this staff, you can expend 1 of its charges to cause the target to take an extra [[/r 1d6[Bludgeoning] #Siege Staff - Battering Strike]] bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it's also pushed 5 feet away from you. In addition, when you attack an object with the staff and hit, maximize your weapon damage dice against the target.

 

Fire Pot. While holding the staff, you can use an action and expend 1 or more charges to cast the @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Grease]{grease} spell from it. You can increase the size of the square covered by the spell by 5 feet for each additional charge you expend in this way (up to a 20-foot square). When you expend 2 or more charges to cast the spell in this way, creatures also take [[/r 2d6[Fire] #Siege Staff - Fire Pot]] fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

 

Trebuchet. While holding the staff, you can use an action and expend 3 charges to magically create and fling a boulder at a point you can see within 60 feet of you. Any target within 5 feet of the point must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes [[/r 4d8[Bludgeoning] #Siege Staff - Trebuchet]] bludgeoning damage, and if it's Medium or smaller, it is also pushed 10 feet away from the point. On a successful save, a target takes half as much bludgeoning damage and isn't pushed. Maximize the bludgeoning damage dice against any object or structure hit by the boulder. After it lands, the boulder disappears.

Flavour: When threatened by invading forces, her ladyship did not back down. She stayed comfortable indoors while the battalions drew close outside, choosing instead to rain her favorite siege options down upon the assailants from her window. She was fearless and cunning, to say the least.

Direstone Runic Wand.name: Direstone Runic Wand
Direstone Runic Wand.description:
A rigid stone wand used by the arcane dwarves of the Direstone mines. The wand has 7 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to trace one of the following runes in the air to invoke its properties (spell save DC 15):

 

Algiz. You can expend 3 charges to grant 1 creature you can see within 10 feet of you resistance to fire damage for 1 hour.

 

Eihwaz. You can expend 2 charges to cast the @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Arcane Lock]{arcane lock} spell. When you use this spell to lock a second object, the spell ends on the first one.

 

Hagalaz. You can expend 2 charges to cast the @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Shatter]{shatter} spell.

 

Kenaz. You can expend 1 charge to cast the @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Burning Hands]{burning hands} spell, or 2 charges to cast the @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Heat Metal]{heat metal} spell.

 

Raidho. You can expend 4 charges to cast the @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Stone Shape]{stone shape} spell. This version of the spell can alter the form of either stone or natural metal (such as iron or silver).

 

Alternatively, you can use the wand to cast the @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Illusory Script]{illusory script} spell over the course of 1 minute by expending 1 of its charges, but can only use it to write on stone or metal surfaces.

 

The wand regains [[/r 1d6 + 1 #Direstone Runic Wand - restore charges]] expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last charge, roll a d20. On a 1, the wand crumbles into stone dust. If you are not a dwarf when this happens, you must also succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw or be petrified until freed by the @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Greater Restoration]{greater restoration} spell or similar magic.

Flavour: The runes along the mine's stone walls seemed to glare at the travelers: judging them and hiding the nature of their meaning. What was certain, however, was that this was a place of law: one misstep, and there would be no turning back. The dwarves of Direstone were as revered for their craft and affluence as they were for their punitive measures.

Ball of Wild Earth.name: Ball of Wild Earth
Ball of Wild Earth.description:
This Tiny, sentient pebble is covered in dirt and is likely a remnant of a charmed earth elemental. It rolls about on its own in search of new and unique sources of dirt. When it finds a patch of particularly rich soil, the ball rolls around in it to incorporate the dirt into its form. The ball carries captured moisture inside itself, allowing it to make its form either dusty or clay-like in texture, as well as hard or soft to the touch. A friendly ball of wild earth can magically reshape the dirt it's covered in to form a variety of shapes at will, such as a tiny figurine or a large die, provided that the dirt continues to cover the pebble at its center by doing so.

 

The ball of wild earth is considered a magical object and is not a creature. It has a speed of 10 feet and can only move by rolling across the ground. It has AC 10, 15 hit points, and has resistance to all damage. The ball regains all its hit points if it's left buried underground for at least 1 hour.

 

Sentience. The ball of wild earth is a sentient neutral item with an Intelligence of 2, a Wisdom of 6, and a Charisma of 4. It has hearing and darkvision out to a range of 60 feet. It can't speak or read, but understands Common and Terran.

 

Personality. The ball of wild earth is most happy when rolling through rich, healthy soil. Most can be found, at least initially, in mountainous farmlands, but even urban ones can enjoy the dust and traces of weird, foreign dirt that are ever-present in well-traveled cities. The quickest way to make a ball of wild earth happy is to give it gemstone dust to roll in, whereas removing the dirt and mud that surround its central pebble is certain to upset it. By reforming the dirt covering its form, the ball can make vague facial expressions based on the emotions its seen other creatures make.

Flavour:

"Who's a dirty little marble? Who's a dirty little marble? You! Yes, you're a dirty little marble!"

Pack of Revisibility Bombs.name: Pack of Revisibility Bombs
Pack of Revisibility Bombs.description:
A pack of revisibility bombs typically includes [[/r 1d3 + 3 #Pack of Revisibility Bombs - number of fist-sized bombs when found]] fist-sized bombs when found. You can use an action to throw a bomb at a point that you can see within 60 feet of you. The bomb explodes at the point where it impacts, destroying the bomb and releasing a dispelling vapor in a cloud around it. When the bomb explodes, each creature within 30 feet of it must make a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes visible if it isn't already, and can't become invisible for 1 minute. Objects within the area that aren't being worn or carried automatically become visible if they're invisible and can't become invisible for 1 minute.

Flavour:

"Did you hear that?" hissed the guard captain. Her hand shot to the blade and satchel at her side.

The other two guards noiselessly nodded at her. Footsteps from the stairwell. Coming toward them.

As the three guards stood at the ready, their weapons drawn, anticipation turned to anxiety as the sound of steps grew quiet. Suddenly, a sharp clink broke the silence like ice into frigid water. The sound of metal, like a blade, scraped against the stone walls to the side of the room around them.

"Show yourselves!" shouted the captain. Her hand, already in a fist, opened to reveal a small, glowing orb. She threw the sphere into the wall where the sound had come from and watched as it shattered against the stone. Billowing vapor filled the space, and a moment later, there were six people in that room, instead of three.

save.chatFlavor: On a failed save, the creature becomes visible if it isn't already, and can't become invisible for 1 minute. Objects within the area that aren't being worn or carried automatically become visible if they're invisible and can't become invisible for 1 minute.

Royal Blade of Amphibios.name: Royal Blade of Amphibios
Royal Blade of Amphibios.description:
This expertly crafted blade is ornamented with rose gold designs of frogs and lily pads. While holding the rapier, you can stand on and move across any liquid surface as if it were solid ground, you can hold your breath for up to 30 minutes at a time, and you gain a swimming speed of 30 feet. In addition, any creature with the Amphibious trait can understand the meaning of your words when you speak, though you gain no special ability to understand them in return.

 

You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. In addition, the blade has 3 charges and regains all expended charges daily at dawn. When you take the Attack action while holding the weapon, you can choose to expend 1 of its charges to transform the blade into a lashing, silver pseudopod that loosely resembles a frog's tongue. Until the end of your turn, the weapon adds 10 feet to your reach when you attack with it and deals slashing damage, instead of piercing, and on a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 10 feet straight toward you.

Flavour:

”Alec Wingwumm, my devoted son—I hereby dub thee Knight Prince of Amphibios, and present to you this royal blade. May you ever be inspired by the bravery of your namesake, and may this weapon serve you in a manner befitting your station and skill. I know you will make our people proud.”

—Anya Wingwumm, Warrior Queen of Amphibios

Royal Blade of Amphibios - swim speed.name: Royal Blade of Amphibios - swim speed

Detective's Notebook.name: Detective's Notebook
Detective's Notebook.description:
This worn notebook is filled with pages of scribbled notes, addendums, and sketches—many of which seem to be added by different sources. While holding the book, whenever you make an Intelligence (Investigation) or Wisdom (Insight) check, you gain a +1 bonus to the roll. If you spend at least 10 minutes investigating or interacting with the subject of these checks while writing notes in the book, you make the roll with advantage.

 

In addition, you can use an action to cast the @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Comprehend Languages]{comprehend languages}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Detect Thoughts]{detect thoughts}, or @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Locate Object]{locate object} spell from the book (save DC 13). Once the book has been used to cast one of these spells, it shouldn't be used to cast a spell again in this way until the next dawn. Each time it is used again before then, the book has a cumulative 20 percent chance [[/r 1d100 #Detective's Notebook - cummulative chance of not working and tearing into useless, nonmagical tatters]] of not working and tearing into useless, nonmagical tatters.

Flavour: ”What are you writing?”

“Everything you’re saying, I may need to refer to it later.”

“This is preposterous! I am a man of high station. I demand to speak to your—"

"Pre...post...er...."

"Ah, dammit, fine! Have it your way."

No-Stones.name: No-Stones
No-Stones.description:
This engraved geode has been split apart into two equal halves. A labyrinth is carved into the rock's rough exterior and glows with a faint light.

While holding one of the halves, you can use an action to speak the geode's command word, "unturned," and turn it over so the flat, gem-encrusted side is pressed against a solid stone, natural metal (such as iron or silver), or earthen surface such as a floor or wall. When you do, the geode becomes magically fixed in place against the surface and projects a 3-foot-spherical map above it, showing the area within 120 feet of it. The map shows all walls, floors, and other surfaces made of either stone, natural metal, or earth within range as translucent outlines and shapes. The map is entirely monochromatic, but shows the general location of any trap or gemstone within its range with a shapeless, red glow.

The geode remains fixed in place until you speak its command word again using a bonus action, its surface moves, or it's forced to hold more than 100 pounds. A creature can use an action to make a DC 15 Strength check, moving the geode and causing the map to vanish.

Once a half has been used in this way, that half can't be used again until the next dawn.

Flavour: "We've been walking in circles for an hour, Gorrin."

The half-orc looked perplexed. "I'm sure that this was the right way, though...."

The dwarf, having had enough, took out a gemstone from his pack. Meliandra looked over to him.

"Oh? Looking at your rocks, again, Dres?"

The dwarf ignored her, placing the gem against the cave floor and muttering a word under his breath.

A spectral map illuminated the dark cave passageway. The corridors and the walls around them appeared, revealing a hidden passage behind a false wall nearby.

"Wow." Muttered Meliandra.

Gorrin stood and contemplated the map, silently. "What are those red lights, Dres?"

Dres picked the stone back up, dismissing the map and stowing it back in his bag. "Either our death or our fortune. Care to find out?"

Staff of the Vineyard.name: 醉藤法杖
Staff of the Vineyard.description:
法杖，非普通（需牧师、德鲁伊、武僧或游侠同调）

这把法杖可以作为一根魔法长棍使用。法杖末端的魔法藤蔓上悬挂着一串葡萄，最多能有10颗。在法杖触及范围内的生物可以用一个动作吃下一颗葡萄，产生与@Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Goodberry]{神莓术 Goodberry}法术中食用浆果相同的效果。每日黎明时，被吃掉的葡萄会重新长出1d10颗。

 

持握此法杖期间，你可以用一个动作从法杖中施展@Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Entangle]{纠缠术 Entangle}（豁免DC 13），使扭曲的葡萄藤从目标区域的地面萌发而出。如果一个被这些藤蔓束缚的生物进行力量检定以尝试挣脱但失败了，该生物会陷入魔法性的醉酒，持续至其下一回合结束。醉酒的生物在持续时间内处于中毒状态。法杖的这项词条一经使用后，直到次日黎明前都无法再次使用。

风味描述： 一根采自赛弗林偏爱的藤本植物嫩枝——被摘取的是藤蔓而非果实。虽然他的美酒备受珍爱，但这些植株本身也同样令人着迷。

Whirling Weapons (Dagger).name: 回转武器（匕首）
Whirling Weapons (Dagger).description:
武器（匕首），珍稀

这些魔法武器由轻量金属锻造而成，其设计初衷是追求速度而非蛮力。回转武器具有灵巧和轻型词条，并且在空气中挥动时会发出轻柔的呼啸声。当你单手持用一把回转武器执行攻击动作时，你可以用一个附赠动作以同一武器发动另一次攻击。你不将属性调整值加入到附赠攻击的伤害中，除非你的调整值为负数。若你的每只手都持各持握着一把不同的回转武器，并且拥有双武器战斗战斗风格，则当你以此法使用附赠动作攻击时，你可以用每把武器各攻击一次。

除此之外，若你拥有双武器战斗战斗风格，你可以将对应的属性调整值加到附赠攻击造成的伤害中。

风味描述： 刀光剑影，一片纷飞。钢刃相击，声声悦耳。我放弃了从这旋风般的猛士手中逃脱的念头，情不自禁地聆听他们武器的清脆鸣响。那声音宛如荒谷中的微风，又似金黄田野上的阵阵狂风。随着那金属的低语声越来越近，仿佛在召唤我倾身向前，聆听他们的战歌。

Arista, Wand of the Spire.name: 阿瑞斯塔，尖塔魔杖
Arista, Wand of the Spire.description:
魔杖，神器（需施法者同调）

数百年前，首次抵达奥罗斯泰德Orostead的首席法师们以真金白银打造了这根优雅的魔杖。此魔杖铸成之时日远在那场令魔法陨落的大动荡发生之前。几个世纪以来，它被且只被那些极度强大、极富智慧的大法师们小心翼翼地使用着。此魔杖具有7充能，可用于后文所述的功能。它在每日黎明时重获所有已消耗的充能。若你不是法师，那么当你用尽了魔杖最后的充能时，骰一次d20。如果骰值为1，则魔杖将消失并重现于阿瑞斯泰俄斯之尖塔（The Spire of Aristaeus，奥罗斯泰德的传奇法师之塔）内的一个秘密金库中。

 

可变词条Variant Properties。该神器的部分词条被一层层休眠中的魔法所封印。随着你逐渐变强并达到某些里程碑，这些词条可能会对你开放。此魔杖同时只能激活下列词条中的至多3项。当你与阿瑞斯塔完成同调时，你可以选择激活至多3项你已满足其先决条件的可变词条。每次你完成一次长休后，你都可以用另一项你满足先决条件的词条替换任何已激活的词条。

  • 持用此魔杖期间，你可以用一个动作从此魔杖中施展下列法术之一（使用你自身的法术豁免DC）： @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Create or Destroy Water]{造水术/枯水术 Create or Destroy Water}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Floating Disk]{谭森漂碟术 Tenser's Floating Diskcreate}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Fog Cloud]{云雾术Fog Cloudfog cloud}、 @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Gaseous Form]{气化形体 Gaseous Form}、@Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Identify]{鉴定术 Identify}或 @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Sanctuary]{庇护术 Sanctuary}。 一旦某一法术被从此魔杖中施展后，直到下一个黎明到来之前都不能再从其中施展这一法术。
  • 持用此魔杖期间，你可以用一个动作并消耗其1充能来施展@Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Magic Missile]{魔法飞弹 Magic Missile} 法术。当你达到9级时，此法术将改以二环效应施展；而当你达到13级时，则改以三环效应施展。
  • (先决：5级) 你的法术攻击加值和法术豁免DC都 +1。当你达到9级时，此加值变为 +2；当你达到17级时，变为 +3。
  • (先决：法师5级) 持用此魔杖期间，你可以用一个动作施展 @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Unseen Servant]{隐形仆役 Unseen Servant} 法术。
  • (先决：9级) 持用此魔杖期间，你可以用一个动作并消耗其2充能来创造如下魔法效应之一（使用你自身的法术豁免DC）：
    • 贯穿强风Drilling Gust。 你将伊利斯湖Lake Ils湖畔无处不在的强风紧缩成一根高速自转的魔法之矛。此矛从魔杖杖尖飞出，贯穿一条长60尺、宽5尺的线形区域。该区域内的每个生物都必须进行一次体质豁免。豁免失败者各自受到3d6穿刺伤害以及3d6寒冷伤害，并被推离15尺。豁免成功者只受到一半伤害，且不会被推离。
    • 虹吸漩涡Siphoning Vortex。 你咒唤伊利斯湖中的奇异暗流，将其化作一团半径为15尺的魔法旋涡，生成于距离你60尺以内地面上你可见的一点。漩涡所在区域内的每个生物都必须进行一次力量豁免检定。豁免失败者各自受到4d6钝击伤害，并向该点方向被拉动至多10英尺，其中豁免骰值比DC低至少5的生物还会因此被击倒在地，且其下个回合会因呛咳、吐水而浪费掉其动作。豁免成功者只受到一半钝击伤害，且不会被拉近。漩涡的水流将会蔓延到地面上，熄灭其范围内一切未收保护的火焰，而后消失。
  • (先决：法师9级) 持用此魔杖期间，你可以用一个动作并消耗其3充能来施展@Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Banishment]{放逐术 Banishment}（使用你自身的法术豁免DC）。除此之外，你一直拥有法术@Compendium[dnd5e.spells.See Invisibility]{识破隐形 See Invisibility}的增益。
  • (先决：13级) 持用此魔杖期间，你获得10尺视距的真实视觉。
  • (先决：法师13级) 持用此魔杖期间，你可以用一个动作并消耗其至少1充能，来施展下列法术之一（使用你自身的法术豁免DC）： @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Arcanist's Magic Aura]{涅斯图魔法灵光Nystul's Magic Aura }(1 充能)、 @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Dimension Door]{任意门 Dimension Door} (2 充能)、 @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Etherealness]{以太化 Etherealness} (5 充能)、 @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Fog Cloud]{云雾术 Fog Cloud} (4 充能；半径1英里的球体范围，在法术持续期间持续存在)、 @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Guards and Wards]{铜墙铁壁 Guards and Wards} (4 充能)、 @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Private Sanctum]{魔邓肯私人密室 Mordenkainen's Private Sanctum} (2 充能)、 @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Teleport]{传送术 Teleport} (5 充能)。
  • (Prerequisite: 20th-level wizard) You gain the benefits of all of this wand's variant properties.

 

摧毁阿瑞斯塔 Destroying Arista。 摧毁尖塔魔杖阿瑞斯塔的唯一方式，便是将其置于以太位面中的一处 @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Antimagic Field]{反魔法场 Antimagic Field}中保持100年。届时，阿瑞斯塔将屈服并化作非魔法之物，此时的阿瑞斯塔便可以被轻易破坏。

风味描述： 巫师们高踞在蜿蜒的塔楼里，俯瞰着下方湖泊。他们观测着两种流动的韵律：既有湖水的波涛，也有城市人潮的涌动。在阵阵海鸥鸣叫中，杂着天马的长嘶与清冽的湖风。居于此高，你可以清晰地观察、倾听与思考。当你凌于众生之上，日常琐碎的困扰自然显得微不足道。

女王曾说他们如此思考实在愚蠢——不，你不可能挥挥魔杖就解决整座城市的温饱与住房。在非魔法的世界里，同样存在着真实的困境。诚然她是位贤明的君主，但有一点她说错了。

世上总存在一根能解决问题的魔杖。

Whirling Weapons (Spear).name: 回转武器（矛）
Whirling Weapons (Spear).description:
武器（矛），珍稀

这些魔法武器由轻量金属锻造而成，其设计初衷是追求速度而非蛮力。回转武器具有灵巧和轻型词条，并且在空气中挥动时会发出轻柔的呼啸声。当你单手持用一把回转武器执行攻击动作时，你可以用一个附赠动作以同一武器发动另一次攻击。你不将属性调整值加入到附赠攻击的伤害中，除非你的调整值为负数。若你的每只手都持各持握着一把不同的回转武器，并且拥有双武器战斗战斗风格，则当你以此法使用附赠动作攻击时，你可以用每把武器各攻击一次。

除此之外，若你拥有双武器战斗战斗风格，你可以将对应的属性调整值加到附赠攻击造成的伤害中。

风味描述： 刀光剑影，一片纷飞。钢刃相击，声声悦耳。我放弃了从这旋风般的猛士手中逃脱的念头，情不自禁地聆听他们武器的清脆鸣响。那声音宛如荒谷中的微风，又似金黄田野上的阵阵狂风。随着那金属的低语声越来越近，仿佛在召唤我倾身向前，聆听他们的战歌。

Verax Weapon (War Pick).name: 肃正武器（战镐）
Verax Weapon (War Pick).description:
武器（战镐），珍稀

肃正武器是通过在锻造时将其金属用特定生物的血液淬火而成的，其上附有一种能猎杀所选类型生物的魔法。你使用此魔法武器进行的攻击检定及伤害掷骰获得 +1 加值。

 

在下表选择或随机确定用于附魔武器之血液的生物类型。当你使用此武器攻击所选类型的生物，且攻击检定带有劣势时，你可以使攻击检定正常掷骰。

[[/r 1d10 #Verax Weapon - creature's blood used]] 生物类型
1 异怪
2 野兽
3 天族
4 龙类
5 妖精
6 邪魔
7 巨人
8 类人
9 怪兽
10 亡灵

 

风味描述： 此刻刀刃已对其充满渴望。一种气味。一种饥饿感。没有什么能够阻止它的啃咬。

Gauntlets of Deliverance.name: 救赎护手
Gauntlets of Deliverance.description:
奇物，非普通（需圣武士同调）

这对银制护手刻有能够吸收疾病和感染的强大法印。当你穿戴这对护手期间，如果你通过魔法治愈一个生物的目盲、耳聋、疾病或中毒状态，你可以选择让护手上的法印暂时容纳该状态，而不是将其直接消除。当护手以此方式容纳着一个状态时，你可以以一个附赠动作触碰一个生物，迫使其进行一次DC 13的体质豁免。豁免失败时，该状态会从护手转移至目标体内，目标将承受该状态的效果直到你的下一回合结束。无论生物豁免成功与否，护手存储的状态都会随之消失。

护手一次只能容纳一个状态。如果你要容纳新的状态，任何已存储的状态都会消失，为新状态腾出空间。

风格描写： 疫病使者居高临下地俯视着冒险者们。当众人因血液中肆虐的剧毒而瘫倒在地时，他那渗人的笑声在幽深的排水管道中层层回荡。

身覆铠甲的女士突然爆发出决绝的意志——尽管她自己已濒临死亡——俯身将神圣辉光注入同伴体内。当血色重新浮现在同伴脸上时，她已纵身扑向恶魔：此刻她的掌心正闪耀着同等神圣的光芒。

刹那间，疫病使者惊觉自己特制的瘟毒——这种从他实验室的炼金恐怖中诞生的独特毒株——竟开始在自己血管中奔涌。

他的眼皮剧烈颤动着，试图集中精神感知体内异状，最终轰然倒地。当黑暗吞噬意识的最后一刻，他发出了近乎叹息的呢喃。

"真是......绝妙。"

utility.chatFlavor: 豁免失败时，该状态会从护手转移至目标体内，目标将承受该状态的效果直到你的下一回合结束。

save.chatFlavor: 豁免失败时，该状态会从护手转移至目标体内，目标将承受该状态的效果直到你的下一回合结束。

Deathloop Watch.name: 死亡溯洄怀表
Deathloop Watch.description:
奇物，珍稀（需同调）

这只金色怀表上有一个骷髅头形状的盖子，盖子上有三块蓝色玻璃盖住了它的两只眼眶和鼻子。表盘中央是一个副表盘，上面有一根小巧的镂空成骷髅头的指针，指示着你剩余的生命值。如果你在佩戴着这块怀表期间死亡，怀表会逆转你个人的时间流，让你以1生命值复活，并允许你立刻站起来。当表以这种方式逆转时间时，怀表的三块玻璃板的其中一块会破裂，并且无法以普通或魔法手段修复。每裂开一块玻璃，怀表就会有 [[/r 1d100 #Deathloop Watch - 25% cummulative chance that the watch fails to reverse time when you die]] 的概率在你死后无法逆转这次时间，此概率累加。当三块玻璃都破裂时，怀表就会变成非魔法的表，不过它仍然可以用来显示时间。

风味描述： 滴答。

 

滴答。

 

滴答。

 

。答滴

 

滴答。

 

滴答。

Redsmith Hammer.name: 红铁匠之锤
Redsmith Hammer.description:
武器（轻锤），普通

这把由矮人锻造的轻锤锤身刻满了符文。当敲击铁砧时，锤身符文会泛起炽红色的光芒并散发热量，使铁匠仅凭此锤与铁砧即可锻铸武器与盔甲。

风味描述： "托马斯，你没事吧？看上去伤得不轻啊。"

"不打紧，铠甲吃了那畜生大部分攻击...不过剑断了。这趟差事的赏钱怕是都得拿去修理装备了。"

托马斯低头看着凹陷的胸甲，又瞥了眼断成两截的佩剑

"可能还得凑点外快。接下来几周怕是没法陪你打猎了。"

鲍尔德咧嘴一笑："甭整这些麻烦事。把家伙什给俺。"说着从次元袋里掏出铁砧和符文密布的锻锤。

"扎营歇着吧。这活儿可得花些功夫。"

Steam Harpoon.name: 蒸汽鱼叉
Steam Harpoon.description:
武器（矛），珍稀

这把矛是魔法与蒸汽动力机械的奇妙结合，其带倒钩的矛头可以从矛柄上发射，并通过连接的锁链快速收回。你使用这把魔法武器进行的攻击检定和伤害掷骰具有 +1 加值。在你的每个回合中，当你用此矛攻击时，你可以选择进行一次特殊的远程攻击，将矛头发射向20尺内的一个目标。这次远程攻击使用你的敏捷调整值进行攻击和伤害掷骰。命中时，目标必须成功通过一次DC 15的力量豁免，否则会被拉向你最多15尺。巨型或更大体型的目标进行此豁免时自动判为成功。无论命中与否，矛头都会在攻击后立即回卷并重新接回武器顶端。

风味描述： 阿沃林船长迫不及待想试试这把新潮的可回收鱼叉。他的船员们很高兴终于不用再下海去捡他投出的三叉戟了。

Eternal Slayer (Scimitar).name: 永恒屠戮者（弯刀）
Eternal Slayer (Scimitar).description:
武器（弯刀），传说（需同调）

这把燃烧的利刃由一个受诅咒的铁魔像残骸打造而成，永远燃烧着复仇的渴望。持握此剑时，火焰从剑刃边缘涌现翻腾，剑身的火焰为周围 20 尺范围提供明亮光照以及额外 20 尺的微光光照。当你处于战斗中时，光照范围翻倍。

你使用这把魔法武器进行的攻击检定和伤害掷骰获得 +2 加值。当你用此剑进行攻击时，沿剑刃下缘的锯齿链条会开始旋转嗡鸣，喷吐火焰并撕裂任何被击中的目标。任何被此剑命中的目标额外受到 1d6 火焰伤害和 1d6 挥砍伤害。如果目标是异怪或邪魔，这些额外伤害翻倍。此火焰伤害无视抗性和免疫。木质生物、物件或建筑被此武器击中时，将承受攻击造成的最大伤害。

风味描述： 我要将毁灭和灾难带给那些妄图将世界拖入地狱、投入火海、引入疯狂深渊的人。我不是救世主，但我至死都是邪恶的终结者。

Badge of the Savant.name: 智者徽章
Badge of the Savant.description:
奇物，非普通

A 智者徽章是一张白金制的藏书票，可以用魔法贴在法师的法术书上。不同徽章的设计代表着不同的魔法学派。在徽章已贴于你法术书的封面上期间，你抄写该徽章所属魔法学派需花费的金钱和时间减半。你可以收集多个徽章，并将它们贴在你的法术书封面上，这样你就可以同时享受多个魔法学派的增益。通过消耗一个环阶数等于1加此书上已有徽章数之和（最高为九环）的法术位，你可以用一个动作将一个徽章贴于一本法术书上或从一本法术书上移除。

风味描述： "奥斯卡！奥斯卡！我找到一个！"

霍莉踩着满是尘土的街道奔向她的朋友。他正翻着他的法术书，这大概是他今天第一百次检查其中的内容了。当她穿过人群向他跑来时，他抬头微笑。

"不可能，真的吗？"他说，"在这个尘土飞扬的小镇里？"

"是啊！给，你还没有防护学派的那个对吧？"

奥斯卡的双眼亮了起来，伸手去拿她手中的金属板。他的笑容更灿烂了。"是，我还没有！太棒了霍莉，谢谢你找到这个！我欠你多少？"

霍莉了然地一笑，"别在意。用它来保护我们就行，好吗？"

奥斯卡咧嘴的笑容变成了真挚的表情，他原本兴奋闪亮的眼中，此刻涌动着另一种情绪。

"永远如此。"

Sagittarian Vestments (Studded Leather).name: 射手座法衣（镶钉皮甲）
Sagittarian Vestments (Studded Leather).description:
护甲（镶钉皮甲），非普通（需牧师或圣武士同调）

这种护甲外覆一件饰有箭头十字符号的披肩。当与护甲同调期间，其符号会变成代表你所信仰神祇的标记。即使你没有与之同调，你也能从护甲获得如下好处。

穿着这件护甲期间，你的感知（医药）检定具有优势，且你可以用一个附赠动作说出护甲的命令语并触碰一个濒死生物，魔法性地稳定其伤势。

在你已与这件护甲同调并穿着它期间，你可以用一个附赠动作从中施展法术灵体武器 Spiritual Weapon，使用 +5 的法术攻击加值和 +2 的施法属性调整值。这个版本的法术会使召唤的武器呈现为一把与你共享空间并随你移动的弓，而非独立移动。这把弓使用灵体箭矢进行远程法术攻击，射程为 30 尺。一旦护甲被用于施展此法术，直到次日黎明前都无法再次施展。此外，当你使用这件护甲的命令语为一个生物稳定伤势时，骰一次 d20。如果骰值为 20，则该生物恢复 1 点生命值。

诅咒 Curse。 这件护甲已被诅咒，与之同调会将诅咒延伸到你身上，直到你被移除诅咒 Remove Curse 法术指定为目标。被诅咒期间，除非你的腿已经是马蹄状，否则它们会魔法般地变形为蹄状马腿，且你的敏捷（隐匿）检定受到 –5 罚值。此外，被诅咒期间，你不借助助跑能跳跃的距离减半。

风味描述：那些选择宣誓的人深知所面临的风险，也清楚自己将要付出的牺牲。然而更为重要的是，他们同样理解由此带来的正面价值：即真实且公正的回报。做出帮助他人、治愈伤痛的决定是一项艰难的选择——相比之下，转身离去显然更容易。但只要真正投入努力去践行，正义与善意终将显现其力量。

Sagittarian Vestments - Advantage on Med.name: 射手座法衣：医药检定优势

Hydra Flail.name: 多头蛇链枷
Hydra Flail.description:
武器（链枷），珍稀

这把链枷的带刺锤头被一个金属多头蛇Hydra头像的巨口衔着。每当你用此武器对敌对生物造成重击时，武器会魔法般地长出另一个带刺锤头。你使用这把魔法武器进行伤害掷骰时，每个锤头都会给予+2加值（最高+6）。1小时后，以此方式长出的任何锤头都会脱落并消失。

风味描述： 一个头，

两个头，

三个头，

你已毙命。

Angler's Armor.name: 渔翁之甲
Angler's Armor.description:
护甲（鳞甲），非普通（需同调）

这件魔法鳞甲由一个自豪的渔民部落手工制成。此甲以无数片硬化的鱼鳞排缀于一件加固的皮质夹克上，使之成为水手们牢靠而防水的理想护甲选择。在你穿着这件鳞甲期间，你获得30尺的游泳速度，且捕网的常规和最大射程对你而言都翻倍。此外，若你在穿着这件鳞甲期间进行捕鱼，你能捕获到相当于平时两倍量的鱼。

风味描述： "有人说锻造这副盔甲的是群爱海如命的鱼贩子。我家老爹总说他们是受不了家乡那群人的嘴脸，就指望着能钓条美人鱼上来。不管咋说，我看他们横竖都是对大海上心。"

Wyrmling Wristlet.name: 雏龙手链
Wyrmling Wristlet.description:
奇物，珍稀（需同调）

这串手链上挂着 [[/r 1d6 + 3 #Wyrmling Wristlet - colorful, egg-shaped beads hanging from it]]颗彩色的卵形珠子。珠子的种类有10种。由DM自行或随机决定手链上每颗珠子的种类。一串手链上可以有多颗相同类型的珠子。你可以用一个动作取下其中一颗珠子，将其投掷向30尺内一处你能看到的未被占据的空间中。当它落地时，珠子会裂开并遭摧毁，并在这处空间中召唤出一条雏龙Dragon Wyrmling。雏龙的种类由珠子的颜色决定：

[[/r 1d10 #Wyrmling Wristlet]] 珠子颜色和雏龙种类
1 @Compendium[dnd5e.monsters.Black Dragon Wyrmling]
2 @Compendium[dnd5e.monsters.Blue Dragon Wyrmling]
3 @Compendium[dnd5e.monsters.Brass Dragon Wyrmling]
4 @Compendium[dnd5e.monsters.Bronze Dragon Wyrmling]
5 @Compendium[dnd5e.monsters.Copper Dragon Wyrmling]
6 @Compendium[dnd5e.monsters.Gold Dragon Wyrmling]
7 @Compendium[dnd5e.monsters.Green Dragon Wyrmling]
8 @Compendium[dnd5e.monsters.Red Dragon Wyrmling]
9 @Compendium[dnd5e.monsters.Silver Dragon Wyrmling]
10 @Compendium[dnd5e.monsters.White Dragon Wyrmling]

 

被召唤的雏龙会在1小时后，或在其生命值降至0时，或当你召唤另一条雏龙时消失。雏龙共享你的先攻，会在你的回合结束后立即行动。它对你和你的同伴保持友好，直到你威胁或伤害到它。雏龙服从你对其下达的任何口头命令（无需动作）。如果你未给出任何命令，它们将从敌对生物处保护自己，但不会执行其他动作。

 

当最后一颗珠子被用掉后，手链就会失去其魔法效果。

风味描述： "一呀，二呀，三呀，四，该用哪个把你囫囵吃？"

Bandolier of the Elements.name: 元素肩带
Bandolier of the Elements.description:
奇物，珍稀（需同调）

这个肩带上挂着6把魔法匕首。在你佩戴着肩带期间，当你执行攻击动作时，你可以用一个附赠动作用一只空闲的手投掷出其中1把匕首，以此用它进行一次远程攻击。当你用其中一把匕首命中目标时，掷一颗d6并查阅下表。目标除受到武器本身的伤害外，还会额外受到1d6伤害（由下表决定伤害类型），且匕首会消失。

 

若未命中，匕首会消失并重新出现在肩带中。如果你不立即投掷匕首，它就会消失并立即重新出现在肩带中。每日黎明时分，[[/r 1d6 #Bandolier of the Elements - missing daggers reappear in the bandolier's empty sheaths daily at dawn]]把消失的匕首会重新出现在肩带的空位中。

[[/r 1d6 #Bandolier of the Elements]] 伤害类型 Damage Type
1 强酸 Acid
2 寒冷 Cold
3 火焰 Fire
4 闪电 Lightning
5 毒素 Poison
6 雷鸣 Thunder

 

风味描述： "最厉害的刺客身上永远揣着一堆匕首，对吧？所以这玩意儿绝对能帮我打响名号，没错吧？"

"首先，真正的顶尖杀手从不起眼。其次...没错，这确实能让你在道上更有面子。"

Heaven's Gavel.name: 天谕之槌
Heaven's Gavel.description:
武器（巨锤），传说（需善良阵营生物同调）

这把铂金武器是一位神圣之龙赐予其忠诚骑士的礼物，世代相传。你使用这把魔法武器进行攻击和伤害检定时具有+3加值。当你用此武器命中邪恶阵营的生物时，该生物额外受到1d6光耀伤害。

 

这把巨锤具有10充能，每日黎明时重获[[/r 1d6 + 4 #Heaven's Gavel - regains charges]]已消耗的充能。当你用巨锤命中一个体型不比你大超过一级的目标时，作为攻击动作的一部分，你可以消耗最多3充能。当你这样做时，目标必须进行一次DC 17的力量豁免。豁免失败则会被击退，每消耗1充能击退10尺；豁免成功则击退距离减半。如果目标因此撞上固体，则每剩余10尺未完成的击退距离造成1d6钝击伤害。如果撞上的固体是一个生物，该生物受到与被攻击目标相同的钝击伤害。

风味描述： "诸神已判你为罪孽深重，卑劣的野兽！直面你的审判，就此消逝吧！"

Spellwriter's Brace.name: 撰法臂环
Spellwriter's Brace.description:
奇物，珍稀（需法师同调）

这个臂环能让你每次完成长休后可以额外准备四个来自你法术书中的法术。这些法术的环阶不能大于五环，且必须是你拥有对应环阶法术位的法术。当你这样做时，准备的法术会以抽象的法术纹身形式出现在你的手臂皮肤上。你可以多次准备同一个法术，花费必要的时间来创造同一法术的多个纹身副本。

你可以用一个动作触碰一个自愿生物并说出臂环的命令语，将你的一个法术纹身转移给它，使法术纹身从你的手臂消失并出现在该生物身上。你一次只能以此方式转移一个纹身。转移第二个法术纹身会导致第一个消失。拥有法术纹身的施法者可以消耗一个大于等于纹身法术环阶的法术位来施展该法术，使用其自身的法术豁免DC、法术攻击调整值和施法属性。法术施展后，其纹身就会消失。

由臂环创造的任何法术纹身都会在你完成长休时或取下臂环时消失。

风味描述： 冬青木双手抱头坐着，面前的书页已经整整五个小时未曾翻动。她理解那些理论，却始终无法让魔法为己所用。当泪水开始在眼眶打转时，她感受到一只温柔的手搭上了她的肩膀。

"冬青，怎么了？"

她猛然抬头，发现是老友奥斯卡。她注意到他额前的鬈发正随着眼镜的摆动被来回拨弄着。

"我...我只是...奥斯卡，你是怎么做到的？"

"做到什么？"

"懂得...这么多。"

奥斯卡沉默伫立，似乎在斟酌措辞。最终他开口道："我不确定我的方法能帮到你，但我会试着与每个法术共鸣。在脑海中规划它、观察它、感受它。"他摆弄着书写护腕时，露出一排显眼的刺青。"来，我试试看能否帮你找到这种感觉。"

当奥术符文流转到冬青木手臂上时，她的泪痕随着法术的共鸣波动而消散。她微笑着伸开手臂，释放了那道魔法。

Helm of the Platinum Dragon.name: 铂金龙之冠
Helm of the Platinum Dragon.description:
奇物，极珍稀（需由善良阵营的龙裔同调）

这顶由铂金打造的魔法头冠受到一位强大的神圣巨龙的祝福。当你戴着这顶头冠时，你的护甲等级和豁免检定获得 +1 加值。当你使用吐息武器时，你可以选择呼出一道神圣的蓝色治愈能量。若你这么做，这道吐息武器造成光耀伤害，区域内邪恶阵营的敌对生物在吐息武器的豁免检定上具有劣势，且区域内任何友方生物不会因吐息受到伤害，而是恢复等同于你吐息武器伤害骰数量的生命值。头冠的这项词条在下次黎明前无法再次使用。

风味描述： 我将为世界注入新生而非毁灭。我将带来和平而非战火。让友人们领略真龙之慈悲，我们的羁绊因此更坚不可摧。

Rings of the True Companions.name: 挚友套戒
Rings of the True Companions.description:
戒指，珍稀（需同调）

这种戒指通常成对出现，但也存在至多四枚的套戒。每枚戒指均以魔法相连，且可由不同生物同调。佩戴其中一枚戒指期间，即使未同调该戒指，你也可使用其以下词条：

 

当你可见的另一名佩戴着此戒指的生物生命值降至0时，你可以用你的反应令其生命值改为降至1。这项词条一经使用，直至次日黎明前都无法再次使用。

 

若你寻得另一枚挚友之戒Ring of the True Companions，可通过将所有戒指共同持握1分钟将其加入套戒之中。每枚戒指同一时间仅能属于一套套戒，若其连续24小时与其他戒指相距超过1英里，则其自动从套戒中移除。

 

若你是唯一同调该套戒中戒指的生物，则该集智将获得3充能，并于每日黎明恢复 [[/r 1d3 #Rings of the True Companions - regain charges]]已消耗的充能。佩戴此戒期间，你可以用一个动作消耗其1充能以施展@Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Cure Wounds]{疗伤术 Cure Wounds}法术（施法属性调整值 +3）。若该法术的目标是佩戴着另一枚此套戒中戒指的生物，则施法距离将提升至30尺。

 

若有不止一位生物与该套戒的戒指同调，其充能将汇聚为充能池并相互共享。除首位同调者外，每额外存在一名同调该套戒的生物，充能池总量便增加2，且每日黎明额外恢复2已消耗的充能。以此方式，套戒至多可共享9充能（1d3+6）。

 

以下特性在所有已同调且佩戴着一枚套戒戒指的生物之间共享。该效果可累加，并取决于已同调佩戴者的数量：

 

2名已同调佩戴者： 当你使用戒指对另一名佩戴者施展疗伤术Cure Wounds时，你可以选择改为使用附赠动作施展该法术，但同一回合内只能施展该法术一次。

 

3名已同调佩戴者： 当你使用戒指对另一名佩戴者施放疗伤术Cure Wounds时，其施法距离增加至60尺，并且你可以额外消耗充能将该法术升环，每额外消耗1充能就升一环，最高可升至四环。

 

4名或更多已同调佩戴者：当你使用戒指对另一名佩戴者施放疗伤术Cure Wounds时，你每消耗1充能便获得[[/r 1d4[Healing] + 1[Healing] #Rings of the True Companions - self healing when cast ure wounds on another weaerer]]临时生命值。

风味描述： 我们的羁绊超越了痛苦。每一滴同哭的热泪，每一颗共洒的汗珠，每一个相视而笑的瞬间，都让我们的情谊愈发坚固。我们是牢不可破锁链上的环扣，永无分离之日。

Dragonband (Gold).name: 龙之腕链（黄金）
Dragonband (Gold).description:
奇物，珍稀

这条金属腕链能松散地挂在手腕或脚腕上，它由黄铜、青铜、赤铜、金、银中的某一种细金属丝制成。腕链的扣环以同种金属铸成龙头形状。

 

在你佩戴着这条腕链期间，你可以用一个动作说出其命令语，使这条手链自行破碎解体，并因此被摧毁。它解体时会在你周围释放出一道强大的能量冲击波。除你之外，所有在腕链周围20尺范围内的生物都必须进行一次DC 15的敏捷豁免，豁免失败则受到10d6某种类型的伤害，成功则只受到一半伤害。该伤害的类型取决于铸成此腕链所用的金属，参见下表：

腕链材质Metal 伤害类型Damage Type
黄铜Brass 火焰Fire
青铜Bronze 闪电Lightning
赤铜Copper 强酸Acid
黄金Gold 火焰Fire
白银Silver 寒冷Cold

 

风味描述： "巨龙的咆哮足以让任何凡人心生恐惧。它们喷吐的烈焰、闪电与寒息能瞬间扫平整个战场。若将这力量据为己有，你以为如何？若将这威能明晃晃地披挂在身，却又暗藏杀机，你又当如何？此般伟力，难道还不足令你感到...无可阻挡？"

Masks of the Sacred Beasts.name: 圣兽面具
Masks of the Sacred Beasts.description:
奇物，多种稀有度（需同调）

这些面具是以某些文化中具有神圣象征含义的动物为原型，以暗色陶瓷和黄金制成的。每种面具的外观及其词条都由其代表的圣兽决定。在你已与某一面具同调期间，你可以只花费1分钟时间（而非在进行一次或多次短休期间）来结束与当前面具的同调，并与另一面具建立新的同调。

 

鳄Crocodile（普通）。 佩戴着圣鳄面具期间，你获得30尺的游泳速度，且你每次可以屏住呼吸至多10分钟。

 

狮Lion（非普通）。 佩戴着圣狮面具期间，你基于嗅觉进行的感知（察觉）检定具有优势。除此之外，你的指甲将长长变为利爪，期间你用手进行的徒手打击可以改为伤害骰为“1d6挥砍”的魔法武器攻击。

 

隼Hawk（珍稀）。 佩戴着圣隼面具期间，你基于视觉进行的感知（察觉）检定具有优势，且你对最大射程之内的目标进行远程攻击时，你的攻击检定不会因目标超出常规射程而具有劣势。除此之外，你可以随意施展羽落术Feather Fall，但只能以你自己为目标。

 

骡Mule（极珍稀）。 佩戴着圣骡面具期间，你的力量值提升2，至多增加至20。当决定你的负重能力以及你能推、拉、举起的重量时，你视为体型更大一级的生物。你为避免被击倒在地而进行的力量和敏捷的豁免和属性检定都具有优势。除此之外，当你以一次近战武器攻击命中了一个大型体型或更小体型的生物时，你可以用一个附赠动作迫使该生物进行一次DC 16的豁免（由对方选择是力量豁免还是敏捷豁免），若其豁免失败，则其将被击倒在地。

 

佩戴着圣豺面具期间，你进行的感知（察觉）检定具有优势，且你免疫暗蚀伤害。

 

除此之外，你可以用一个动作，从你的额前向一个距离你60尺以内且你能看见的生物发射一道幽绿色的魔法射线。目标生物必须进行一次DC 17的体质豁免，豁免失败则受到7d8+30暗蚀伤害，豁免成功则只受到一半伤害。面具的这项词条一经使用，则其直至次日黄昏前都无法再次使用。

 

被该暗蚀伤害杀死的类人生物会在你的下一个回合开始时重生成为一个@Compendium[dnd5e.monsters.Mummy]{木乃伊 Mummy}。它受你的控制，并根据自己的先攻值行动。若你未处于失能状态，且木乃伊在你的120尺范围以内，那么你就可以在你的回合内用意念指挥木乃伊（无需动作）。你可以决定木乃伊在其下一个回合内应当执行何种动作、移动到何处，或者你也可以向其下达普通的命令，例如消灭某个敌人或守好某处地点。

 

木乃伊将持续存在，直至你用一个附赠动作将其遣散时，或直至其生命值降至0时，或直至你不再与任何圣兽面具保持同调时化作沙尘并消失。同一时间内，你只能以此法创造并控制至多一个木乃伊。

 

风味描述： 今晨我们误闯了一队战士的营地。背着大部分补给和炊具的拉伦斯不慎绊倒，锅碗碰撞的锐响暴露了我们的位置。那群戴着漆黑鳄鱼面具的战士齐刷刷转过头来，每个动作都透着掠食者特有的力量与杀机。时间仿佛凝固了，我甚至听不见近在咫尺的河水声，耳中只剩下自己剧烈的心跳。

我们"逃"走了——如果这个词能形容那心惊胆战的一分钟的话。没听到灌木丛的响动，我们天真地以为对方没打算追击。大错特错。

又跑了一分钟后，我们躲在倒下的松树下喘息。刚觉得安全，就看见那些战士再度出现——此时他们手持长矛，面具已换成狮子、苍鹰与胡狼的形貌。

我的心跳再次震耳欲聋，简直害怕战士们都听得见。其中戴狮面具的女战士抽动鼻子，突然转向我们藏身的古松。她对同伴说了什么，手持长矛向我们走来——另一只手里还攥着什么东西。

她在树前放下面具：一具骡子的。未发一言，她回到队伍中，如出现时那般无声消散。

——士兵加罗德的日记选段

Ring of Stolen Alacrity.name: 掠影疾行之戒
Ring of Stolen Alacrity.description:
戒指，非普通

此戒指的外环可转动，戒指表面绘有一系列人物奔跑的分解动作图。若你旋转外环，图中的人物会如动画般奔跑起来。

佩戴此戒指期间，若你并未被突袭，你可以在掷先攻骰时用你的反应旋转指环并说出其命令语。此反应需在以下时机使用：你已知晓先攻顺序（若DM公开），但尚未有任何生物开始其回合时。选择你能看见且30尺内已投掷先攻的一个生物，目标需成功通过一次DC 13的魅力豁免检定，否则其先攻总值将与你的互换。该生物可自愿选择豁免失败。这项词条一经使用后，直至次日黎明前都无法再次使用。

若DM未向你公开先攻顺序，你可通过此反应选择你30尺范围内至多三个你可见的生物。你将立即得知这些生物各自的行动顺位是否先于或后于你，随后选择其中一位目标照常进行豁免检定。

风味描述： 介意我插个手吗？

Amulet of the Spirit Naga.name: 精魂纳迦护符
Amulet of the Spirit Naga.description:
奇物，极珍稀（需同调）

这面手镜约1尺高，重1磅。当你凝视其镜面时，你会看到一个与自己略有不同的自己。例如，你的双腿关节可能向反方向弯曲，你的眼睛可能漆黑如墨，或者你的倒影可能过一会儿才能跟上你的动作。如果你未与魔镜同调却手持魔镜并凝视镜中倒影时，你必须进行一次DC 16的感知豁免。豁免失败时，你将恐慌于魔镜，无法移开视线或放开魔镜，且你的速度在效应持续期间内变为0。因此陷入恐慌期间，你可以在自己回合开始时或受到伤害时重复进行该豁免，成功则终止该效应。若你看不见魔镜，则进行该豁免时具有优势。豁免成功后，你在24小时内免疫此效应。

风味描述： 汝之灵魂可得救赎。可从凡躯遗蜕中涅槃重生。汝之魂魄不染生者之谬，不沾肉身之衰。唯当超越死亡之时，方为真正活过。

Amulet of the Spirit Naga - Poison immun.name: 精魂纳迦护符 - 免疫中毒状态和毒素伤害

Bullfrog Totem.name: 牛蛙图腾
Bullfrog Totem.description:
奇物，普通

一只牛蛙的魔法妖精精魂栖息在这座覆有青苔的小石像中。能够看见隐形物体的生物可以看到这个精魂在雕像周围的空中游动。这座雕像高9寸，重3磅。苍蝇、蚊蚋和蚊子等无害的普通昆虫会因魔法效应而被驱离以雕像为中心，半径30尺的球状范围。

风味描述： "虫子！黏糊糊的——但美味至极！"

Ki Blade.name: 气之刃
Ki Blade.description:
武器（短剑），极珍稀（需武僧同调）

这把略带弧度的长刀能与你的气产生共鸣。你用这把魔法武器进行的攻击检定和伤害掷骰获得 +2 加值。与此武器已同调期间，你的“气”上限值 +2。

 

在持握着气之刃期间，当你使用你的拨挡飞弹Deflect Missiles特性时，你可以改为用气之刃拦截飞弹，而非尝试徒手抓取它。若如此做，该远程攻击造成的伤害将额外降低1d10。若该伤害被降至0，则被拦截的飞弹会直接被摧毁；但如果该飞弹为魔法弹药，则其不会被摧毁，而是掉落在你脚边。在你使用气之刃的此词条后，你可以在同一回合再次花费1点气使用你的拨挡飞弹特性，以图摧毁同一攻击者发射出的多发飞弹。

风味描述： 吸气。吐纳。这将是你的最后一次深沉呼吸。

Monarch Mantle.name: 王蝶披风
Monarch Mantle.description:
奇物，珍稀（需同调）

当你穿着这件丝绸般、边缘呈波浪状的披风时，你可以用一个附赠动作获得30尺的飞行速度，持续至你本回合结束。以此法飞行时，披风会在你身后像蝴蝶翅膀一样拍动。

 

此外，这件披风具有3充能，并在每日黎明时重获1d3已消耗的充能。在你穿着这件披风期间，当一个你能看见的生物攻击并命中你时，你可以用你的反应并消耗披风的1充能，使你只承受本次攻击的一半伤害，并将你传送到距你至多15尺以内，一处你能看见且未被占据的空间。当你这样做时，你会伴随着一群蝴蝶华丽地现身。这些蝴蝶会停留在该空间，直到当前回合结束。在此期间内，只要你留在该空间，任何针对你的攻击检定都具有劣势。

风味描述： "我说想要一件看起来像王者之袍的服装时，可没想到会是这样的。"

 

"噢，所以你不喜欢？我可以把它拿回——"

 

"不，别碰它，我爱死它了。我现在看起来简直难以置信。"

Enzymatic Gastrostaff.name: 噬解法杖
Enzymatic Gastrostaff.description:
法杖，极珍稀（需同调）

这根法杖是从一只强大的泰拉斯奎Tarrasque的呕吐物中寻得的，表面覆盖着一层奇特的魔法粘液。持握此法杖时，你获得对强酸伤害的抗性。该法杖可作为一把魔法短棍使用，命中时额外造成1d4强酸伤害。

 

此外，你可以用一个动作以法杖触碰一个中型或更小的自愿生物，对其施展变巨术/缩小术Enlarge/Reduce，无需专注，但只能使用法术的变巨Enlarge选项。当该生物被以这种方式变大时，除了获得法术的正常效果外，其对物件和建筑造成双倍伤害，且在其每回合开始时获得1d6+4临时生命值。如果被变大的生物生命值降至0，则效果提前结束。当效果结束时，该生物获得1级力竭。法杖的这个特性一旦使用后，直到下一个黎明才能再次使用。

风味描述： 那团腺体抽搐蠕动着，不断渗出病态的紫色黏液包裹自身。无论它原本是什么器官，无论它曾经有何功能，都透着令人毛骨悚然的气息。翻动遗骸只会激起更剧烈的反应——难道它还活着？

有些谜题，无论源于魔法还是自然，永远不解开反而更好。

Resistance to acid damage while you hold.name: 持握此法杖时，你获得对强酸伤害的抗性

Arborguard Shield.name: 林木护盾
Arborguard Shield.description:
护甲（盾牌），极珍稀（需同调）

这面巨大的木质盾牌以一名古老树人的树皮制成。在你持用着此盾期间，你的AC获得 +1 加值。这一加值可与盾牌自身的AC加值叠加。在你持用着此盾期间，你可以用一个动作说出其命令语，在距离你120尺以内的一处固体表面上创造出一道由至多12棵大树构成的墙。每棵树的底面直径都为5尺，高20尺，且都必须与另一棵树相邻。

或者，你也可以以你所在之处为圆心创造出一圈由树木组成的环形墙，其外直径至多为25尺。这些树将紧密地生长在一起，以阻止出入树墙内外的移动，并为任何位于树后的事物提供全身掩护。每棵树都只会在有足够空间的情况下才长出树冠。若树墙生成时有生物位于其空间内，则该生物将被推到墙体的一侧，且该生物必须进行一次DC16的敏捷豁免，豁免失败则受到8d6钝击或穿刺伤害（由你选择），豁免成功则只受到一半伤害。树墙是可以受到伤害并被破坏的物件。每棵树都具有13 AC，20生命值，且对火焰伤害易伤。当某棵树的生命值降至0时，该树将消失。此效果结束时，整个树墙会全部消失。当你在距树墙30尺范围内期间，你的感官可以穿透树体所占的空间并看到另一边（无需动作）。

当你在距至少一棵树30尺范围内期间进行近战武器攻击时，你可以如同你在其中一棵树所占的空间内一般进行攻击。若如此做，树木会魔法性地形成生成一个你连同你用于攻击之武器的木质复制品来进行攻击，且此次攻击会复制任何本次攻击的效果。树墙存在的持续时间为你“专注，至多1分钟”（如同你专注于一个法术）。

风味描述： 有人见木不见林，而我见林如见千军。

Tempest Griffon Bracers.name: 风暴狮鹫臂环
Tempest Griffon Bracers.description:
奇物，珍稀（需同调）

当你戴着这对涂油并镶嵌着魔法狮鹫Griffion羽毛的臂环期间，你的速度增加5尺。

此外，你可以使用一个动作说出臂环的命令语，消失在一团火花和羽毛之中。选择你可见的至多3个位于你周围60尺内的不同生物。你对每个目标进行一次近战武器攻击，你在进行攻击前会短暂出现在每个目标旁边。若命中，目标受到额外2d8闪电伤害；若未命中，则受到一半的闪电伤害。随后你可以传送到你能看见的一个目标5尺内的未被占据空间，或返回你原来的位置，在电光、羽毛和风的华丽特效中重新出现。臂环的这项词条一旦使用后，直到下一个黎明之前都无法再次使用。

风味描述： 随着一阵裹挟着臭氧味的风暴席卷而过，她的身影消失无踪。当守卫队长拾起女子消失处飘落的一根羽毛时，身后传来两名精英护卫含混不清的呻吟。他转身看向眼前横陈的尸体时，突然察觉到电流的噼啪声、熟悉的臭氧气息，以及一柄锋利匕首刺入骨髓的锐痛。

Helm of the Ruby Dragon.name: 红宝石龙之冠
Helm of the Ruby Dragon.description:
奇物，极珍稀（需由中立阵营的龙裔同调）

这顶由黄金和红宝石打造的魔法头冠受到一位强大灵能巨龙的祝福。当你戴着这顶头冠期间，你在智力（调查）检定以及通过观察或知识获取信息的智力检定上具有优势。此外，你可以与30尺内的任何生物进行心灵感应交谈。该生物只有在与你共通一种语言的情况下才能理解你。你每次只能与一个生物进行心灵感应交谈。

当你戴着这顶头冠使用吐息武器时，你可以选择呼出一道纯粹的震荡力场。如果这么做，你的吐息武器造成力场伤害而非其原本的伤害类型，且任何豁免失败的生物额外受到2d6心灵伤害，并陷入震慑直到你的下一回合结束。头冠的这个熟悉在下次黎明前无法再次使用。

风味描述： "我追求客观，精于算计。他人遗漏的真相终将被我揪出，让他们在我的智慧面前颤抖吧。"

Helm of the Ruby Dragon - Adv on Intelli.name: 红宝石龙之冠 - 智力（调查）检定优势

Gorget of the Holy Soldier.name: 圣武护颈
Gorget of the Holy Soldier.description:
奇物，传说（需善良阵营生物同调）

这个魔法护颈注入了星天神使Planetar的神圣力量，已经传承了数代，每个穿戴者都能激发出不同的力量。当你穿戴这个护颈期间，你获得光耀伤害抗性并获得以下增益。如果你拥有可以忽略使用魔法物品的职业、种族或等级要求的特性，你可以选择获得其中一项增益。这个选择在你第一次同调该物品时做出。

 

神侍之赋 Investiture of the Planetar。 如果你有10级或更高的野蛮人等级，你的力量增加2，最高可达26，且当你处于狂暴状态时，任何被你的近战武器攻击命中的生物额外受到1d6光耀伤害。

 

天堂圣咏 Litany of Heaven。 如果你有10级或更高的吟游诗人等级，你获得说与理解所有语言的能力。此外，每当你给予一个生物诗人激励时，该生物恢复等于你的魅力调整值两倍的生命值。

 

神圣审判 Divine Judge & Jury。 如果你有10级或更高的牧师等级，你始终准备有@Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Commune]{通神术 Commune}、@Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Dispel Evil and Good]{反制善恶 Dispel Evil and Good}和@Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Raise Dead]{死者复活 Raise Dead}法术，且它们不计入你每日可准备的法术数量。此外，当你使用法术位施展死者复活时，你可以选择将其作为一个动作施展，而不是其正常施法时间。当你这样做时，该法术不需要材料成分且目标复活时恢复一半的最大生命值。使用此特性后，七天内无法再次使用。

 

预兆先知 Herald of Omens。如果你有10级或更高的德鲁伊等级，护颈会布满藤蔓和树叶。当你穿戴它期间，你始终准备有@Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Control Weather]{操控天气 Control Weather}和@Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Insect Plague]{疫病虫群 Insect Plague}法术，且它们不计入你每日可准备的法术数量。此外，你可以使用附赠动作从背后召唤一对白色羽翼。当羽翼存在时，你获得60尺飞行速度。这对羽翼将会持续存在，直到你失能、死亡，或以一个附赠动作解除它们。

 

不屈军势 Unstoppable Legionnaire。 如果你有10级或更高的战士等级，你免疫魅惑和恐慌效果，且你对来自非魔法攻击的钝击、穿刺和挥砍伤害具有抗性。

 

Angelic Grace. 如果你有10级或更高的武僧等级，你的步行速度增加10尺，且你在对抗擒抱的属性检定上具有优势。此外，当你未穿着任何护甲时，你的AC获得 +2加值。

 

生命抚慰Caress of Life。 如果你有10级或更高的圣武士等级，你的治疗能量池增加10生命值。此外，你可以消耗能量池中的10生命值来终止一个生物身上的目盲、耳聋或麻痹效果。或者，你可以消耗能量池中的15生命值来终止影响一个生物或物品的诅咒，如同法术@Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Remove Curse]{移除诅咒 Remove Curse} 一样。

 

天穹守望Sight of the Celestial Warden。 如果你有10级或更高的游侠等级，你在感知（察觉）检定上具有优势，且获得15尺的真实视觉。此外，你能够清晰地看到最远1英里的距离，且能像在100尺距离内一样分辨细节。

 

天界使者Heavenly Messenger。 如果你有10级或更高的游荡者等级，你可以使用一个附赠动作从护颈中施展@Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Invisibility]{隐形术 Invisibility}（无需专注），只能以自己为目标。使用后需要完成一次短休或长休才能再次使用。此外，你可以与30尺内的任意生物进行心灵感应。该生物只有在与你共享至少一种共同语言的情况下才能理解你。你每次只能与一个生物进行心灵感应。

 

光耀之魂Luminous Soul。如果你有10级或更高的术士等级，你学会戏法@Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Light]{光亮术 Light} 和 @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Dancing Lights]{舞光术 Dancing Lights}以及一环法术@Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Guiding Bolt]{光导箭 Guiding Bolt} ，它们不计入你已知的戏法或术士已知法术数量。你可以消耗2点术法点或使用法术位来施展光导箭。如果你使用术法点施展并命中目标，目标必须通过一次对抗你法术豁免DC的体质豁免，否则将陷入目盲直到你下回合开始。此外，当你施展造成伤害的法术时，你可以消耗1点术法点将其伤害类型改为光耀。

 

真知契约Pact of Veracious Awareness。 如果你有10级或更高的魔契师等级，你能知道是否听到谎言。当你听到生物说谎时，你可以尝试迫使该生物说出真相。该生物必须通过一次对抗你法术豁免DC的魅力豁免，否则将被迫如实回答你的下一个问题。你可以使用该能力的次数等于你的魅力调整值，并在完成一次长休后恢复所有已使用次数。

 

天族守御Celestial Wards。 如果你有10级或更高的法师等级，你的AC变为13 + 你的敏捷或智力调整值（由你选择）。此外，你在对抗法术和其他魔法效应的豁免检定上具有优势。

风格描述： 至善至圣者啊，毋需畏惧。吾携天启而来，奉九霄至净诸神之谕，尔今受封为天选之将，当佩与此位相称之圣器。跪下吧，蒙恩者。承接吾置于尔肩之神赐武装，披挂天界众军之祝福前行。因汝已受天命，当行神迹于世间。

Gorget of the Holy Soldier - Resistance.name: 圣武护颈 - -光耀伤害抗性

Gorget of the Holy Soldier - Investiture.name: 圣武护颈 - 神侍之赋

Gorget of the Holy Soldier - Litany of H.name: 圣武护颈 - 天堂圣咏

Gorget of the Holy Soldier - Celestial W.name: 圣武护颈 - 天族守御（智力）

Gorget of the Holy Soldier - Sight of th.name: 圣武护颈 - 天穹守望

Gorget of the Holy Soldier - Angelic Gra.name: 圣武护颈 - 天族神韵

Gorget of the Holy Soldier - Unstoppable.name: 圣武护颈 - 不屈军势

Gorget of the Holy Soldier - Herald of O.name: 圣武护颈 - 预兆先知

Gorget of the Holy Soldier - Celestial W.name: 圣武护颈 - 天族守御（敏捷）

Whirling Weapons (Quarterstaff).name: 回转武器（长棍）
Whirling Weapons (Quarterstaff).description:
武器（长棍），珍稀

这些魔法武器由轻量金属锻造而成，其设计初衷是追求速度而非蛮力。回转武器具有灵巧和轻型词条，并且在空气中挥动时会发出轻柔的呼啸声。当你单手持用一把回转武器执行攻击动作时，你可以用一个附赠动作以同一武器发动另一次攻击。你不将属性调整值加入到附赠攻击的伤害中，除非你的调整值为负数。若你的每只手都持各持握着一把不同的回转武器，并且拥有双武器战斗战斗风格，则当你以此法使用附赠动作攻击时，你可以用每把武器各攻击一次。

除此之外，若你拥有双武器战斗战斗风格，你可以将对应的属性调整值加到附赠攻击造成的伤害中。

风味描述： 刀光剑影，一片纷飞。钢刃相击，声声悦耳。我放弃了从这旋风般的猛士手中逃脱的念头，情不自禁地聆听他们武器的清脆鸣响。那声音宛如荒谷中的微风，又似金黄田野上的阵阵狂风。随着那金属的低语声越来越近，仿佛在召唤我倾身向前，聆听他们的战歌。

Dragonbreath Ammunition (Bronze).name: 龙息弹药（青铜）
Dragonbreath Ammunition (Bronze).description:
武器（箭或弩矢），珍稀

这种金属箭矢在发射出去后将自行飞行。当你通过攻击动作进行一次远程武器攻击时，你可以选择将此箭矢射向你视野范围内可见的一点处。箭矢将在飞达该点时发生爆炸，摧毁此箭矢并沿其飞行方向产生一处龙息效果。效果的覆盖区域和伤害类型取决于铸造此箭矢使用的金属。受影响区域内的每个生物都必须进行一次DC 15 的敏捷豁免检定，豁免失败则受到 4d8 相应类型的伤害，成功则只受到一半伤害。参见下表来确定效果的影响区域和伤害类型：

箭矢材质 影响区域 伤害类型
黄铜 长 60 尺，宽 5 尺的线形范围 火焰
青铜 长 90 尺，宽 5 尺的线形范围 闪电
赤铜 长 60 尺，宽 5 尺的线形范围 强酸
黄金 长 60 尺的锥形范围 火焰
白银 长 60 尺的锥形范围 寒冷

风味描述： “成年龙类的吐息范围有九十多尺远。长弓轻易就能射到一百尺开外。所以我觉得，伊拉，这支箭比试图驾驭一头巨龙去替我们办事要好得多。”

Power Collar.name: 力量项圈
Power Collar.description:
奇物，珍稀

这个尖刺的皮革项圈大小可调节，在它的侧面有一个熊头形状的扣。你可以用一个动作将项圈戴在一个自愿的中型体型或更小的生物的脖子上。如果该生物是一名友好的野兽伙伴或一只魔宠（比如法术 @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Find Familiar]{寻获魔宠 Find Familiar}召唤的生物），你可以作为此动作的一部分说出项圈的命令语，以在你和该生物之间建立一种魔法的绑定，该绑定直到解开项圈时才会消失。当被绑定的生物戴上项圈时，它的生命值上限增加等同于你角色等级的数值。

 

此外，当受绑定的生物距你30尺以内且你能看到它时，你可以用一个附赠动作说出项圈的命令语。当你这样做时，该生物从@Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Enlarge/Reduce]{变巨术/缩小术 Enlarge/Reduce}中获得变巨选项的效果（无需专注）；或者若你在受绑定生物30尺内生命值降至0时，该生物可以用其反应来获得该法术的效果。这项词条一经使用，则其必须经过2天才能再次使用。

 

如果佩戴项圈的野兽或魔宠是变形的类人生物或其他生物（例如通过@Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Polymorph]{变形术 Polymorph}或类似魔法变形），那么你说出命令语时不会与该生物绑定，项圈也不会产生效果。如果被绑定的生物是被法术@Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Find Familiar]{寻获魔宠 Find familiar}召唤的魔宠，当你暂时解散它时，项圈和魔宠会一起消失在小位面中。如果绑定的魔宠永远消失或生命值降为0，它就会留下项圈。一个生物同时只能获得一个魔法项圈的好处。

风味描述： "趴下！别动！不不不不——胡椒！我说的是'待着'不是'宰人'！下去！给我下去！"

Mimicloak.name: 拟身怪斗篷
Mimicloak.description:
奇物，非普通

这件奇特的斗篷是由幼年拟身怪Mimic的遗骸加以附魔制成的。在你穿着这件斗篷期间，你可以用一个附赠动作说出其命令语，来改变斗篷的样式、颜色与外观上的质地。斗篷的重量不会因此改变。无论斗篷的外观如何改变，这件斗篷永远只是一件拥有这些词条的斗篷，而不会真正变成其他材质。

 

在你穿着这件斗篷期间，你为逃脱擒抱而进行的属性检定具有优势。每当你为让自己逃脱擒抱或摆脱束缚而进行属性检定时，斗篷的布料都将魔法性地张开尖牙利嘴来啃咬擒抱住或束缚住你的生物或物件，对其造成1d10穿刺伤害。

风味描述： "等...等等，你的斗篷刚才是咬了我一口吗？"

Trampling Crossbow.name: 践踏重弩
Trampling Crossbow.description:
武器（重弩），非普通

这把重弩蕴含着暴怒公牛的力量。当你使用这把魔法武器进行攻击检定且掷出20时，弩矢在击中目标后会立即化为幻影兽群践踏目标。此时，该目标以及你所能看见的、位于其15尺内由你选择的最多2个其他目标必须进行一次DC 13的力量豁免。豁免失败时，目标受到1d8钝击伤害，且如果目标是大型或更小体型，会被推离10尺远。豁免成功时，目标受到一半钝击伤害且不会被推动。对物件和建筑物造成的钝击伤害翻倍。

风味描述： 若敢戏公牛，双角穿你喉。

Mage Eater Scythe.name: 食法魔镰
Mage Eater Scythe.description:
武器（长柄刀），传说（需同调）

这把暗色魔法镰刀的刀刃犹如狞笑着的邪魔之嘴。你使用这把魔法武器进行的攻击检定及伤害掷骰都获得 +2 加值。

 

在你持用着这把镰刀期间，你为抵抗法术和魔法效应之影响而进行的豁免都具有优势。当你用这把镰刀攻击并命中一个生物时，你可以消耗你的2～4颗生命骰（你不因此恢复生命值），每消耗一颗，目标生物便额外受到1d6暗蚀伤害。如果目标生物自你最后一次结束你的回合起施展过法术，那么上述暗蚀伤害骰由d6改为d10，且目标生物还会失去环阶数总和等于你以此法消耗生命骰颗数的法术位，从该生物还剩的最高环阶法术位（至高四环）起开始向下消耗。

 

或者，当你持用着这把镰刀时，你也可以用一个动作并消耗你的5颗生命骰（你不因此恢复生命值）来在你身边创造出一道魔法屏障。这道屏障存在期间，除非你自愿，否则任何五环或更低环阶的法术都无法对你造成影响，也无法侦测到你；同时距离你10尺以内的所有友方生物为抵抗法术和魔法效应之影响而进行的豁免都具有优势。该屏障的存续时间为你“专注，至多1分钟”（如同你专注一个法术），或者直到你丢下或收起这把镰刀为止。

风味描述： 法师们视魔法如呼吸般自然。他们认为这是灵魂的本质：一种让他们区别于常人、塑造其存在的能力。强大。骄傲。不可摧折。

 

当这份力量被硬生生撕离躯体，当他们在眼睁睁看着魔力核心被掏空时，会作何反应？会乞求活命吗？会哀告慈悲吗？会落荒而逃吗？还是会挺起脊梁，用残存的气力殊死一搏？

 

这些都无关紧要。

 

结局不会改变。他们既非第一个，也绝非最后一个。纵使惶惶不可终日，纵使枕戈待旦设下结界，这世间也没有他们死神追索不及的避难所。

 

那些肆意挥洒法术之人，不过是在亲手掘深自己的坟茔。

Weapon of Verdict (Club).name: 裁决武器（短棒）
Weapon of Verdict (Club).description:
武器（短棒），非普通（需善良阵营的生物同调）

这些磨光的木质武器是牧师和圣武士们在做出惩黑除恶、扶危济困这些传统意义上的正义之举时所用的武器。每一把武器都被一位强大的牧师或天族生物祝福过。一把裁决武器具有3充能，且会在每日黎明时恢复[[/r 1d3 #Weapon of Verdict - recharge charges daily at dawn]]充能。你可以用此武器的充能使用其如下词条：

 

谴责。当你用此武器命中一个生物时，你可以消耗武器的1充能，对目标额外造成[[/r 1d8 #Fire damage to the target]]火焰伤害。

 

褒扬。以一个动作，你可以消耗武器的1充能并用此武器触碰除你之外的一个生物，使其恢复[[/r 1d8 + 2 #Restore hit points]]生命值。

风味描述： 你的一切恶行终将受到惩处，我必确保此事。你所戕害之人亦将获救，此诺必践。

Forgekeeper's Spark.name: 锻炉火花
Forgekeeper's Spark.description:
奇物，非普通

这块煤炭中残存着一个火元素精魄的碎片，使其表面覆盖着触摸起来温暖宜人的无害蓝色余烬。当被火焰包围时，煤炭会燃烧出魔法蓝焰，其中的精魄便会显现。精魄会一直存在直到火焰熄灭或被浇灭，届时精魄会藏回煤炭中，直到再次置入火焰中。如果将其从火中取出，精魄会随着燃烧的煤炭移动并持续存在最多1分钟。

 

当精魄存在时，它会帮助照料所在的火焰。精魄可以维持一个最多占据5尺立方空间的火焰。被精魄照料的火焰获得以下好处：

  • 不会被强风吹灭。
  • 除非你愿意，否则不会产生烟雾。
  • 使用相同燃料可以燃烧两倍的正常时间。
  • 在火焰中烹饪的食物会保持理想的温度。

 

此外，当你使用厨师工具、玻璃匠工具、铁匠工具或修补工具在火焰中加热和制作物品时，相关的属性检定具有优势。如果你在d20上掷出15或更高的结果，使用工具所需的时间减半。

 

智能Sentience。 这块锻炉火花是一件守序中立的智能魔法物品，具有1智力、6感知和1魅力。它免疫火焰伤害，具有60尺范围的听觉和黑暗视觉。它不能说话或阅读，但能理解通用语和火族语。

 

个性Personality。 锻炉火花 锻炉火花最喜欢待在锻造炉的火焰中，也喜欢帮忙维持营火。它严格控制着火焰的边界，防止火势失控蔓延，并且善于管理给它的任何燃料。它喜欢协助烹饪和金属加工等任务，当有新东西需要加热时，它会兴奋地火花四射，噼啪作响。

风味描绘： 叮咚的歌声在铁匠铺里回荡，铁锤敲击铁砧的节奏为这旋律打着拍子。来往的顾客多是浅尝辄止，只觉这场景淳朴讨喜；但那些明眼人驻足细看时，终会发觉这位铁匠竟是在对炉火吟唱。他那摇曳的音符与精准的锤击，谱成了一曲他与火焰之灵共同劳作起舞的合唱。这绝非闲来无事的哼唱——不，他正用歌声赞美着他的工作伙伴、挚友，以及缪斯。

Weapon of Verdict (Morningstar).name: 肃正武器（钉头锤）
Weapon of Verdict (Morningstar).description:
武器（戟），非普通（需善良阵营的生物同调）

这些磨光的木质武器是牧师和圣武士们在做出惩黑除恶、扶危济困这些传统意义上的正义之举时所用的武器。每一把武器都被一位强大的牧师或天族生物祝福过。一把裁决武器具有3充能，且会在每日黎明时恢复[[/r 1d3 #Weapon of Verdict - recharge charges daily at dawn]]充能。你可以用此武器的充能使用其如下词条：

 

谴责。当你用此武器命中一个生物时，你可以消耗武器的1充能，对目标额外造成[[/r 1d8 #Fire damage to the target]]火焰伤害。

 

褒扬。以一个动作，你可以消耗武器的1充能并用此武器触碰除你之外的一个生物，使其恢复[[/r 1d8 + 2 #Restore hit points]]生命值。

风味描述： 你的一切恶行终将受到惩处，我必确保此事。你所戕害之人亦将获救，此诺必践。

Chronal Sphere.name: 时契宝珠
Chronal Sphere.description:
奇物，极珍稀

这个黄铜球体大约有拳头大小，重1磅。在你持握着它期间，内部的微小机械会发出嗡嗡声并使其轻微震动。持握此球期间，你可以用一个附赠动作说出其命令语，令幽影指针出现在其弧形表面上，显示当前时间。在你再次说出命令语之前，指针会一直保持在宝珠表面。此属性只在物质位面生效。

 

法术Spells。 持握宝珠期间，你可以用一个动作从中施展@Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Haste]{加速术haste} 或 @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Slow]{缓慢术slow}。宝珠以此方式施展过一个法术后，便无法再次施展该法术。当宝珠被用来施展过这两个法术后，就会失去此属性。

风味描述： "有时你会感觉时间从不站在你这边：眼睁睁看着秒数从指缝间流逝，徒劳地试图抓住几分时光。而现在，你至少能亲眼目睹时间的流动，甚至在某些情况下...改写它。"

Weapon of Verdict (Halberd).name: 裁决武器（戟）
Weapon of Verdict (Halberd).description:
武器（戟），非普通（需善良阵营的生物同调）

这些磨光的木质武器是牧师和圣武士们在做出惩黑除恶、扶危济困这些传统意义上的正义之举时所用的武器。每一把武器都被一位强大的牧师或天族生物祝福过。一把裁决武器具有3充能，且会在每日黎明时恢复[[/r 1d3 #Weapon of Verdict - recharge charges daily at dawn]]充能。你可以用此武器的充能使用其如下词条：

 

谴责。当你用此武器命中一个生物时，你可以消耗武器的1充能，对目标额外造成[[/r 1d8 #Fire damage to the target]]火焰伤害。

 

褒扬。以一个动作，你可以消耗武器的1充能并用此武器触碰除你之外的一个生物，使其恢复[[/r 1d8 + 2 #Restore hit points]]生命值。

风味描述： 你的一切恶行终将受到惩处，我必确保此事。你所戕害之人亦将获救，此诺必践。

Verax Weapon (Rapier).name: 肃正武器（刺剑）
Verax Weapon (Rapier).description:
武器（刺剑），珍稀

肃正武器是通过在锻造时将其金属用特定生物的血液淬火而成的，其上附有一种能猎杀所选类型生物的魔法。你使用此魔法武器进行的攻击检定及伤害掷骰获得 +1 加值。

 

在下表选择或随机确定用于附魔武器之血液的生物类型。当你使用此武器攻击所选类型的生物，且攻击检定带有劣势时，你可以使攻击检定正常掷骰。

[[/r 1d10 #Verax Weapon - creature's blood used]] 生物类型
1 异怪
2 野兽
3 天族
4 龙类
5 妖精
6 邪魔
7 巨人
8 类人
9 怪兽
10 亡灵

 

风味描述： 此刻刀刃已对其充满渴望。一种气味。一种饥饿感。没有什么能够阻止它的啃咬。

Appraiser's Eye.name: 评鉴师之眼
Appraiser's Eye.description:
奇物，珍稀（需由一眼缺失的生物同调）

这个金质球体的尺寸与一只眼球相仿，上面镶嵌着由紫色宝石制成的虹膜。其重量轻到可忽略不计。此球具有3充能，并在每日黎明时重获[[/r 1d3 #Appraiser's Eye - regain charges]] 已消耗的充能。即使你未与它进行同调，你也可以如常使用它（及其充能）来实现其如下属性：

 

在你手持着此义眼期间，你可以用一个动作并消耗其1充能，来施展此球中的@Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Identify]{鉴定术Identify}。或者，你也可以将此义眼用作施展通晓传奇Legend Lore所需的材料M成分。若如此做，此球只有 10% 的概率会被此法术消耗，该概率累加。

 

你已与此球完成同调期间，只要它位于你的眼窝中，它便能像正常的眼睛一样工作，而且你为判断物品价值而进行的智力检定以及依赖视觉的感知（察觉）检定都具有优势。此外，如果你在与此球同调后期间施展通晓传奇，并将此球作为法术的材料成分，则此球将被法术消耗的那 10% 概率不会累加，而且如果球体即将被此法术消耗，它将不会因此而被消耗或被摧毁，而是改为失去这一属性，不能再作为该法术的成分使用。

风味描述：

你总能认出这些鉴定师。他们那只镶嵌宝石的黄金独眼似乎能洞穿万物，揪出物品的真正价值。有人说他们对真挚的情感视而不见，也有人坚称他们是少数能看透事物本质的明白人。

但其实鉴定师们心知肚明——他们只是被贪婪蒙蔽了双眼。受安特罗涅克行会的诱惑与财富承诺所吸引，他们剜去自己的眼睛，结果反而成为更可悲的凡人，终日被黄金宝石折磨。他们失去了作为人的珍贵特质。如今这些人的价值只等同于随身携带的金币，而最令他们痛苦的是，任何像他们当年那样容易上当的新人，都能随时取代他们的位置。

Cube of Teleportation.name: 传送方块
Cube of Teleportation.description:
奇物，珍稀

这个沉重的金属方块每边约6寸，重3磅。方块的一面看起来像金属印章，由无数相互咬合且不断变化的金属板组成，这些板块每日黎明时分会重新排列，魔法般地生成一个新的独特符文序列，如传@Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Teleportation Circle]{传送法阵Teleportation circle}所述。其余五面则是平整空白的，或者也可能记录有至多5个不同的符文序列（取决于DM的裁量）。

 

如果你发现一个永久性的传送法阵，你可以将方块的一个平面贴在法阵上并持续1小时，并在此期间保持专注（如同专注于法术）。如果你持握方块并在整个持续时间内保持专注，该法阵的符文序列就会被记录在方块的这一面上。如果这一面已有符文序列，则会被新的替代。

 

这个方块具有3充能，且在每日黎明恢复1d3已消耗的充能。如果你将方块上记录的某个符文序列朝下放置在地面上，并维持专注1分钟（如同专注于法术），方块会消耗1充能并复制@Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Teleportation Circle]{传送法阵Teleportation circle}的效果，使用方块该面的符文序列在其下方的地面上形成法术的传送法阵。

 

另外，你可以将方块的印章面朝下放在地面上并维持专注1分钟（如同专注于法术）。如果你持握方块并在整个持续时间内保持专注，只要有足够的空间，它就会魔法般地将其独特的符文序列应用到地面上，形成一个直径10尺的传送法阵。这个法阵持续1小时，在持续时间内只能作为目的地法阵使用。这个一经使用属性，直到下一个黎明前都无法再次使用，除非你用一个动作并消耗方块的1发充能来生成新的符文序列并重获这项词条的使用权。一旦你以这种方式放置了独特的传送法阵，你就可以将方块的这一面作为已生成法阵的普通符文序列记录来使用。

风味描述： 你能瞬间抵达世界上任何想去的地方——只要那地方在这张短得可怜的名单上。

Lightscreen Hover Boots.name: 光幕悬浮靴
Lightscreen Hover Boots.description:
奇物，珍稀（需同调）

这双厚重的靴子行走时出奇地轻盈。当穿着这双靴子期间，你可以用一个附赠动作跺跺脚跟，使自己悬浮在离地面1尺的高度。你可以用你的步行速度正常移动，在蓝色光幕的托举下滑行。这道光芒会散发5尺半径的明亮光照，并额外散发5尺的微光光照。

 

以一个动作，你可以说出靴子的命令语让光芒变得更亮，直到你的回合结束前散发40尺半径的明亮光照，并额外散发40尺的微光光照。作为这个动作的一部分，你可以立即以你的步行速度在任何水平或垂直表面上移动，包括墙壁或倒挂在天花板上。此移动不会引发借机攻击，并会在你身后留下一道蓝色光痕。在这次移动结束时，光痕会凝固成一道蓝色光墙，从你移动时所在的表面垂直延伸，但不包括你当前所处的空间。这道墙是半透明的，厚度为1/4寸，高度最多10尺。如果墙体出现时穿过了某个生物占据的空间，该生物会被推到墙的某一侧（由你选择）。

 

任何物体都无法穿过这道墙。墙体免疫所有伤害，且无法被@Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Dispel Magic]{解除魔法Dispel Magic}所解除。然而，@Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Disintegrate]{解离术Disintegrate}能立即摧毁这道墙。

 

Flavour: "Can't touch this!"

Candleflame Bow (Hand Crossbow).name: 烛焰弓（手弩）
Candleflame Bow (Hand Crossbow).description:
武器（手弩），非普通（需同调）

这把远程武器以金属锻造而成，它形似火盆，握柄上覆有蜡，在箭或弩矢发射位置的前方安置着一支质朴的蜡烛。这支魔法蜡烛无法从武器上移除，其蜡也永远不会耗尽。你可以用一个附赠动作说出武器的命令语使蜡烛自行点燃，其点燃期间如同普通蜡烛一样发光。在蜡烛点燃期间，这把魔法武器的远程攻击命中目标时额外造成 2 点火焰伤害。蜡烛的火焰持续到你用一个附赠动作再次说出命令语，或直到你放下或收起武器为止。

在蜡烛点燃期间，如果你使用此武器进行有优势或劣势的远程攻击检定，且两个 d20 骰出相同数字，弹药将被狂暴的烈焰环绕。箭或弩矢会飞向目标并爆炸，摧毁这发弹药并对目标造成 4d6 火焰伤害（代替攻击的正常伤害），若攻击检定低于目标的 AC 则伤害减半。这种火焰会点燃目标 5 尺范围内未被着装或携带的易燃物品。这项词条一经使用，则其直至次日黎明前都无法再次使用。

风味描述：
吾将驱散笼罩阴影之深沉黑暗，为幻灭寒寂之境带来澄明与温暖。循吾之光，吾等将同心同行于光明之中。

Spirit Sheath.name: 灵鞘
Spirit Sheath.description:
